GV01rv_hn05u:1: RV_5,001.01a abodhy agniḥ samidhā janānām prati dhenum ivāyatīm uṣāsam |
GV01rv_hn05u:2: RV_5,001.01c yahvā iva pra vayām ujjihānāḥ pra bhānavaḥ sisrate nākam
GV01rv_hn05u:4: RV_5,001.02a abodhi hotā yajathāya devān ūrdhvo agniḥ sumanāḥ prātar asthāt |
GV01rv_hn05u:5: RV_5,001.02c samiddhasya ruśad adarśi pājo mahān devas tamaso nir amoci ||
GV01rv_hn05u:6: RV_5,001.03a yad īṃ gaṇasya raśanām ajīgaḥ śucir aṅkte śucibhir gobhir
GV01rv_hn05u:8: RV_5,001.03c ād dakṣiṇā yujyate vājayanty uttānām ūrdhvo adhayaj juhūbhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:9: RV_5,001.04a agnim acchā devayatām manāṃsi cakṣūṃṣīva sūrye saṃ caranti |
GV01rv_hn05u:10: RV_5,001.04c yad īṃ suvāte uṣasā virūpe śveto vājī jāyate agre ahnām ||
GV01rv_hn05u:11: RV_5,001.05a janiṣṭa hi jenyo agre ahnāṃ hito hiteṣv aruṣo vaneṣu |
GV01rv_hn05u:12: RV_5,001.05c dame-dame sapta ratnā dadhāno 'gnir hotā ni ṣasādā yajīyān ||
GV01rv_hn05u:13: RV_5,001.06a agnir hotā ny asīdad yajīyān upasthe mātuḥ surabhā u loke |
GV01rv_hn05u:14: RV_5,001.06c yuvā kaviḥ puruniṣṭha ṛtāvā dhartā kṛṣṭīnām uta madhya iddhaḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:15: RV_5,001.07a pra ṇu tyaṃ vipram adhvareṣu sādhum agniṃ hotāram īḷate
GV01rv_hn05u:17: RV_5,001.07c ā yas tatāna rodasī ṛtena nityam mṛjanti vājinaṃ ghṛtena ||
GV01rv_hn05u:18: RV_5,001.08a mārjālyo mṛjyate sve damūnāḥ kavipraśasto atithiḥ śivo naḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:19: RV_5,001.08c sahasraśṛṅgo vṛṣabhas tadojā viśvāṃ agne sahasā prāsy anyān ||
GV01rv_hn05u:20: RV_5,001.09a pra sadyo agne aty eṣy anyān āvir yasmai cārutamo babhūtha |
GV01rv_hn05u:21: RV_5,001.09c īḷenyo vapuṣyo vibhāvā priyo viśām atithir mānuṣīṇām ||
GV01rv_hn05u:22: RV_5,001.10a tubhyam bharanti kṣitayo yaviṣṭha balim agne antita ota dūrāt
GV01rv_hn05u:23: RV_5,001.10c ā bhandiṣṭhasya sumatiṃ cikiddhi bṛhat te agne mahi śarma
GV01rv_hn05u:25: RV_5,001.11a ādya ratham bhānumo bhānumantam agne tiṣṭha yajatebhiḥ samantam |
GV01rv_hn05u:26: RV_5,001.11c vidvān pathīnām urv antarikṣam eha devān haviradyāya vakṣi ||
GV01rv_hn05u:27: RV_5,001.12a avocāma kavaye medhyāya vaco vandāru vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe |
GV01rv_hn05u:28: RV_5,001.12c gaviṣṭhiro namasā stomam agnau divīva rukmam uruvyañcam aśret ||
GV01rv_hn05u:29: RV_5,002.01a kumāram mātā yuvatiḥ samubdhaṃ guhā bibharti na dadāti pitre
GV01rv_hn05u:30: RV_5,002.01c anīkam asya na minaj janāsaḥ puraḥ paśyanti nihitam aratau ||
GV01rv_hn05u:31: RV_5,002.02a kam etaṃ tvaṃ yuvate kumāram peṣī bibharṣi mahiṣī jajāna |
GV01rv_hn05u:32: RV_5,002.02c pūrvīr hi garbhaḥ śarado vavardhāpaśyaṃ jātaṃ yad asūta mātā
GV01rv_hn05u:33: RV_5,002.03a hiraṇyadantaṃ śucivarṇam ārāt kṣetrād apaśyam āyudhā mimānam
GV01rv_hn05u:34: RV_5,002.03c dadāno asmā amṛtaṃ vipṛkvat kim mām anindrāḥ kṛṇavann anukthāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:35: RV_5,002.04a kṣetrād apaśyaṃ sanutaś carantaṃ sumad yūthaṃ na puru śobhamānam |
GV01rv_hn05u:36: RV_5,002.04c na tā agṛbhrann ajaniṣṭa hi ṣaḥ paliknīr id yuvatayo bhavanti
GV01rv_hn05u:37: RV_5,002.05a ke me maryakaṃ vi yavanta gobhir na yeṣāṃ gopā araṇaś cid āsa
GV01rv_hn05u:38: RV_5,002.05c ya īṃ jagṛbhur ava te sṛjantv ājāti paśva upa naś cikitvān ||
GV01rv_hn05u:39: RV_5,002.06a vasāṃ rājānaṃ vasatiṃ janānām arātayo ni dadhur martyeṣu |
GV01rv_hn05u:40: RV_5,002.06c brahmāṇy atrer ava taṃ sṛjantu ninditāro nindyāso bhavantu ||
GV01rv_hn05u:41: RV_5,002.07a śunaś cic chepaṃ niditaṃ sahasrād yūpād amuñco aśamiṣṭa hi
GV01rv_hn05u:43: RV_5,002.07c evāsmad agne vi mumugdhi pāśān hotaś cikitva iha tū niṣadya
GV01rv_hn05u:44: RV_5,002.08a hṛṇīyamāno apa hi mad aiyeḥ pra me devānāṃ vratapā uvāca |
GV01rv_hn05u:45: RV_5,002.08c indro vidvāṃ anu hi tvā cacakṣa tenāham agne anuśiṣṭa āgām ||
GV01rv_hn05u:46: RV_5,002.09a vi jyotiṣā bṛhatā bhāty agnir āvir viśvāni kṛṇute mahitvā |
GV01rv_hn05u:47: RV_5,002.09c prādevīr māyāḥ sahate durevāḥ śiśīte śṛṅge rakṣase vinikṣe ||
GV01rv_hn05u:48: RV_5,002.10a uta svānāso divi ṣantv agnes tigmāyudhā rakṣase hantavā u |
GV01rv_hn05u:49: RV_5,002.10c made cid asya pra rujanti bhāmā na varante paribādho adevīḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:50: RV_5,002.11a etaṃ te stomaṃ tuvijāta vipro rathaṃ na dhīraḥ svapā atakṣam
GV01rv_hn05u:51: RV_5,002.11c yadīd agne prati tvaṃ deva haryāḥ svarvatīr apa enā jayema ||
GV01rv_hn05u:52: RV_5,002.12a tuvigrīvo vṛṣabho vāvṛdhāno 'śatrv aryaḥ sam ajāti vedaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:53: RV_5,002.12c itīmam agnim amṛtā avocan barhiṣmate manave śarma yaṃsad dhaviṣmate manave śarma yaṃsat ||
GV01rv_hn05u:54: RV_5,003.01a tvam agne varuṇo jāyase yat tvam mitro bhavasi yat samiddhaḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:55: RV_5,003.01c tve viśve sahasas putra devās tvam indro dāśuṣe martyāya ||
GV01rv_hn05u:56: RV_5,003.02a tvam aryamā bhavasi yat kanīnāṃ nāma svadhāvan guhyam bibharṣi |
GV01rv_hn05u:57: RV_5,003.02c añjanti mitraṃ sudhitaṃ na gobhir yad dampatī samanasā kṛṇoṣi
GV01rv_hn05u:58: RV_5,003.03a tava śriye maruto marjayanta rudra yat te janima cāru citram
GV01rv_hn05u:59: RV_5,003.03c padaṃ yad viṣṇor upamaṃ nidhāyi tena pāsi guhyaṃ nāma gonām
GV01rv_hn05u:60: RV_5,003.04a tava śriyā sudṛśo deva devāḥ purū dadhānā amṛtaṃ sapanta |
GV01rv_hn05u:61: RV_5,003.04c hotāram agnim manuṣo ni ṣedur daśasyanta uśijaḥ śaṃsam āyoḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:62: RV_5,003.05a na tvad dhotā pūrvo agne yajīyān na kāvyaiḥ paro asti svadhāvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:63: RV_5,003.05c viśaś ca yasyā atithir bhavāsi sa yajñena vanavad deva martān
GV01rv_hn05u:64: RV_5,003.06a vayam agne vanuyāma tvotā vasūyavo haviṣā budhyamānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:65: RV_5,003.06c vayaṃ samarye vidatheṣv ahnāṃ vayaṃ rāyā sahasas putra martān
GV01rv_hn05u:66: RV_5,003.07a yo na āgo abhy eno bharāty adhīd agham aghaśaṃse dadhāta |
GV01rv_hn05u:67: RV_5,003.07c jahī cikitvo abhiśastim etām agne yo no marcayati dvayena ||
GV01rv_hn05u:68: RV_5,003.08a tvām asyā vyuṣi deva pūrve dūtaṃ kṛṇvānā ayajanta havyaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:69: RV_5,003.08c saṃsthe yad agna īyase rayīṇāṃ devo martair vasubhir idhyamānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:70: RV_5,003.09a ava spṛdhi pitaraṃ yodhi vidvān putro yas te sahasaḥ sūna ūhe |
GV01rv_hn05u:71: RV_5,003.09c kadā cikitvo abhi cakṣase no 'gne kadāṃ ṛtacid yātayāse ||
GV01rv_hn05u:72: RV_5,003.10a bhūri nāma vandamāno dadhāti pitā vaso yadi taj joṣayāse |
GV01rv_hn05u:73: RV_5,003.10c kuvid devasya sahasā cakānaḥ sumnam agnir vanate vāvṛdhānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:74: RV_5,003.11a tvam aṅga jaritāraṃ yaviṣṭha viśvāny agne duritāti parṣi |
GV01rv_hn05u:75: RV_5,003.11c stenā adṛśran ripavo janāso 'jñātaketā vṛjinā abhūvan ||
GV01rv_hn05u:76: RV_5,003.12a ime yāmāsas tvadrig abhūvan vasave vā tad id āgo avāci |
GV01rv_hn05u:77: RV_5,003.12c nāhāyam agnir abhiśastaye no na rīṣate vāvṛdhānaḥ parā dāt ||
GV01rv_hn05u:78: RV_5,004.01a tvām agne vasupatiṃ vasūnām abhi pra mande adhvareṣu rājan |
GV01rv_hn05u:79: RV_5,004.01c tvayā vājaṃ vājayanto jayemābhi ṣyāma pṛtsutīr martyānām ||
GV01rv_hn05u:80: RV_5,004.02a havyavāḷ agnir ajaraḥ pitā no vibhur vibhāvā sudṛśīko asme |
GV01rv_hn05u:81: RV_5,004.02c sugārhapatyāḥ sam iṣo didīhy asmadryak sam mimīhi śravāṃsi ||
GV01rv_hn05u:82: RV_5,004.03a viśāṃ kaviṃ viśpatim mānuṣīṇāṃ śucim pāvakaṃ ghṛtapṛṣṭham agnim |
GV01rv_hn05u:83: RV_5,004.03c ni hotāraṃ viśvavidaṃ dadhidhve sa deveṣu vanate vāryāṇi ||
GV01rv_hn05u:84: RV_5,004.04a juṣasvāgna iḷayā sajoṣā yatamāno raśmibhiḥ sūryasya |
GV01rv_hn05u:85: RV_5,004.04c juṣasva naḥ samidhaṃ jātaveda ā ca devān haviradyāya vakṣi ||
GV01rv_hn05u:86: RV_5,004.05a juṣṭo damūnā atithir duroṇa imaṃ no yajñam upa yāhi vidvān |
GV01rv_hn05u:87: RV_5,004.05c viśvā agne abhiyujo vihatyā śatrūyatām ā bharā bhojanāni ||
GV01rv_hn05u:88: RV_5,004.06a vadhena dasyum pra hi cātayasva vayaḥ kṛṇvānas tanve svāyai |
GV01rv_hn05u:89: RV_5,004.06c piparṣi yat sahasas putra devānt so agne pāhi nṛtama vāje asmān ||
GV01rv_hn05u:90: RV_5,004.07a vayaṃ te agna ukthair vidhema vayaṃ havyaiḥ pāvaka bhadraśoce
GV01rv_hn05u:91: RV_5,004.07c asme rayiṃ viśvavāraṃ sam invāsme viśvāni draviṇāni dhehi ||
GV01rv_hn05u:92: RV_5,004.08a asmākam agne adhvaraṃ juṣasva sahasaḥ sūno triṣadhastha havyam |
GV01rv_hn05u:93: RV_5,004.08c vayaṃ deveṣu sukṛtaḥ syāma śarmaṇā nas trivarūthena pāhi ||
GV01rv_hn05u:94: RV_5,004.09a viśvāni no durgahā jātavedaḥ sindhuṃ na nāvā duritāti parṣi |
GV01rv_hn05u:95: RV_5,004.09c agne atrivan namasā gṛṇāno 'smākam bodhy avitā tanūnām ||
GV01rv_hn05u:96: RV_5,004.10a yas tvā hṛdā kīriṇā manyamāno 'martyam martyo johavīmi |
GV01rv_hn05u:97: RV_5,004.10c jātavedo yaśo asmāsu dhehi prajābhir agne amṛtatvam aśyām ||
GV01rv_hn05u:98: RV_5,004.11a yasmai tvaṃ sukṛte jātaveda u lokam agne kṛṇavaḥ syonam |
GV01rv_hn05u:99: RV_5,004.11c aśvinaṃ sa putriṇaṃ vīravantaṃ gomantaṃ rayiṃ naśate svasti ||
GV01rv_hn05u:100: RV_5,005.01a susamiddhāya śociṣe ghṛtaṃ tīvraṃ juhotana |
GV01rv_hn05u:104: RV_5,005.03a īḷito agna ā vahendraṃ citram iha priyam |
GV01rv_hn05u:106: RV_5,005.04a ūrṇamradā vi prathasvābhy arkā anūṣata |
GV01rv_hn05u:108: RV_5,005.05a devīr dvāro vi śrayadhvaṃ suprāyaṇā na ūtaye |
GV01rv_hn05u:110: RV_5,005.06a supratīke vayovṛdhā yahvī ṛtasya mātarā |
GV01rv_hn05u:112: RV_5,005.07a vātasya patmann īḷitā daivyā hotārā manuṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:113: RV_5,005.07c imaṃ no yajñam ā gatam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:114: RV_5,005.08a iḷā sarasvatī mahī tisro devīr mayobhuvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:116: RV_5,005.09a śivas tvaṣṭar ihā gahi vibhuḥ poṣa uta tmanā |
GV01rv_hn05u:118: RV_5,005.10a yatra vettha vanaspate devānāṃ guhyā nāmāni |
GV01rv_hn05u:122: RV_5,006.01a agniṃ tam manye yo vasur astaṃ yaṃ yanti dhenavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:123: RV_5,006.01c astam arvanta āśavo 'staṃ nityāso vājina iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara ||
GV01rv_hn05u:124: RV_5,006.02a so agnir yo vasur gṛṇe saṃ yam āyanti dhenavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:125: RV_5,006.02c sam arvanto raghudruvaḥ saṃ sujātāsaḥ sūraya iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā
GV01rv_hn05u:127: RV_5,006.03a agnir hi vājinaṃ viśe dadāti viśvacarṣaṇiḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:128: RV_5,006.03c agnī rāye svābhuvaṃ sa prīto yāti vāryam iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara ||
GV01rv_hn05u:129: RV_5,006.04a ā te agna idhīmahi dyumantaṃ devājaram |
GV01rv_hn05u:130: RV_5,006.04c yad dha syā te panīyasī samid dīdayati dyavīṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara ||
GV01rv_hn05u:131: RV_5,006.05a ā te agna ṛcā haviḥ śukrasya śociṣas pate |
GV01rv_hn05u:132: RV_5,006.05c suścandra dasma viśpate havyavāṭ tubhyaṃ hūyata iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara ||
GV01rv_hn05u:133: RV_5,006.06a pro tye agnayo 'gniṣu viśvam puṣyanti vāryam |
GV01rv_hn05u:134: RV_5,006.06c te hinvire ta invire ta iṣaṇyanty ānuṣag iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara ||
GV01rv_hn05u:135: RV_5,006.07a tava tye agne arcayo mahi vrādhanta vājinaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:136: RV_5,006.07c ye patvabhiḥ śaphānāṃ vrajā bhuranta gonām iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā
GV01rv_hn05u:138: RV_5,006.08a navā no agna ā bhara stotṛbhyaḥ sukṣitīr iṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:139: RV_5,006.08c te syāma ya ānṛcus tvādūtāso dame-dama iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara
GV01rv_hn05u:140: RV_5,006.09a ubhe suścandra sarpiṣo darvī śrīṇīṣa āsani |
GV01rv_hn05u:141: RV_5,006.09c uto na ut pupūryā uktheṣu śavasas pata iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara ||
GV01rv_hn05u:142: RV_5,006.10a evāṃ agnim ajuryamur gīrbhir yajñebhir ānuṣak |
GV01rv_hn05u:143: RV_5,006.10c dadhad asme suvīryam uta tyad āśvaśvyam iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā
GV01rv_hn05u:145: RV_5,007.01a sakhāyaḥ saṃ vaḥ samyañcam iṣaṃ stomaṃ cāgnaye |
GV01rv_hn05u:146: RV_5,007.01c varṣiṣṭhāya kṣitīnām ūrjo naptre sahasvate ||
GV01rv_hn05u:147: RV_5,007.02a kutrā cid yasya samṛtau raṇvā naro nṛṣadane |
GV01rv_hn05u:148: RV_5,007.02c arhantaś cid yam indhate saṃjanayanti jantavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:149: RV_5,007.03a saṃ yad iṣo vanāmahe saṃ havyā mānuṣāṇām |
GV01rv_hn05u:150: RV_5,007.03c uta dyumnasya śavasa ṛtasya raśmim ā dade ||
GV01rv_hn05u:151: RV_5,007.04a sa smā kṛṇoti ketum ā naktaṃ cid dūra ā sate |
GV01rv_hn05u:152: RV_5,007.04c pāvako yad vanaspatīn pra smā mināty ajaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:153: RV_5,007.05a ava sma yasya veṣaṇe svedam pathiṣu juhvati |
GV01rv_hn05u:154: RV_5,007.05c abhīm aha svajenyam bhūmā pṛṣṭheva ruruhuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:155: RV_5,007.06a yam martyaḥ puruspṛhaṃ vidad viśvasya dhāyase |
GV01rv_hn05u:156: RV_5,007.06c pra svādanam pitūnām astatātiṃ cid āyave ||
GV01rv_hn05u:157: RV_5,007.07a sa hi ṣmā dhanvākṣitaṃ dātā na dāty ā paśuḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:159: RV_5,007.08a śuciḥ ṣma yasmā atrivat pra svadhitīva rīyate |
GV01rv_hn05u:160: RV_5,007.08c suṣūr asūta mātā krāṇā yad ānaśe bhagam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:161: RV_5,007.09a ā yas te sarpirāsute 'gne śam asti dhāyase |
GV01rv_hn05u:162: RV_5,007.09c aiṣu dyumnam uta śrava ā cittam martyeṣu dhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:163: RV_5,007.10a iti cin manyum adhrijas tvādātam ā paśuṃ dade |
GV01rv_hn05u:164: RV_5,007.10c ād agne apṛṇato 'triḥ sāsahyād dasyūn iṣaḥ sāsahyān nṝn ||
GV01rv_hn05u:165: RV_5,008.01a tvām agna ṛtāyavaḥ sam īdhire pratnam pratnāsa ūtaye sahaskṛta |
GV01rv_hn05u:166: RV_5,008.01c puruścandraṃ yajataṃ viśvadhāyasaṃ damūnasaṃ gṛhapatiṃ vareṇyam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:167: RV_5,008.02a tvām agne atithim pūrvyaṃ viśaḥ śociṣkeśaṃ gṛhapatiṃ ni ṣedire |
GV01rv_hn05u:168: RV_5,008.02c bṛhatketum pururūpaṃ dhanaspṛtaṃ suśarmāṇaṃ svavasaṃ jaradviṣam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:169: RV_5,008.03a tvām agne mānuṣīr īḷate viśo hotrāvidaṃ viviciṃ ratnadhātamam |
GV01rv_hn05u:170: RV_5,008.03c guhā santaṃ subhaga viśvadarśataṃ tuviṣvaṇasaṃ suyajaṃ
GV01rv_hn05u:172: RV_5,008.04a tvām agne dharṇasiṃ viśvadhā vayaṃ gīrbhir gṛṇanto namasopa sedima |
GV01rv_hn05u:173: RV_5,008.04c sa no juṣasva samidhāno aṅgiro devo martasya yaśasā sudītibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:174: RV_5,008.05a tvam agne pururūpo viśe-viśe vayo dadhāsi pratnathā puruṣṭuta
GV01rv_hn05u:175: RV_5,008.05c purūṇy annā sahasā vi rājasi tviṣiḥ sā te titviṣāṇasya
GV01rv_hn05u:177: RV_5,008.06a tvām agne samidhānaṃ yaviṣṭhya devā dūtaṃ cakrire havyavāhanam |
GV01rv_hn05u:178: RV_5,008.06c urujrayasaṃ ghṛtayonim āhutaṃ tveṣaṃ cakṣur dadhire
GV01rv_hn05u:180: RV_5,008.07a tvām agne pradiva āhutaṃ ghṛtaiḥ sumnāyavaḥ suṣamidhā sam īdhire |
GV01rv_hn05u:181: RV_5,008.07c sa vāvṛdhāna oṣadhībhir ukṣito 'bhi jrayāṃsi pārthivā vi
GV01rv_hn05u:183: RV_5,009.01a tvām agne haviṣmanto devam martāsa īḷate |
GV01rv_hn05u:184: RV_5,009.01c manye tvā jātavedasaṃ sa havyā vakṣy ānuṣak ||
GV01rv_hn05u:185: RV_5,009.02a agnir hotā dāsvataḥ kṣayasya vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:186: RV_5,009.02c saṃ yajñāsaś caranti yaṃ saṃ vājāsaḥ śravasyavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:187: RV_5,009.03a uta sma yaṃ śiśuṃ yathā navaṃ janiṣṭāraṇī |
GV01rv_hn05u:188: RV_5,009.03c dhartāram mānuṣīṇāṃ viśām agniṃ svadhvaram ||
GV01rv_hn05u:189: RV_5,009.04a uta sma durgṛbhīyase putro na hvāryāṇām |
GV01rv_hn05u:190: RV_5,009.04c purū yo dagdhāsi vanāgne paśur na yavase ||
GV01rv_hn05u:191: RV_5,009.05a adha sma yasyārcayaḥ samyak saṃyanti dhūminaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:192: RV_5,009.05c yad īm aha trito divy upa dhmāteva dhamati śiśīte dhmātarī yathā ||
GV01rv_hn05u:193: RV_5,009.06a tavāham agna ūtibhir mitrasya ca praśastibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:194: RV_5,009.06c dveṣoyuto na duritā turyāma martyānām ||
GV01rv_hn05u:195: RV_5,009.07a taṃ no agne abhī naro rayiṃ sahasva ā bhara |
GV01rv_hn05u:196: RV_5,009.07c sa kṣepayat sa poṣayad bhuvad vājasya sātaya utaidhi pṛtsu no vṛdhe ||
GV01rv_hn05u:197: RV_5,010.01a agna ojiṣṭham ā bhara dyumnam asmabhyam adhrigo |
GV01rv_hn05u:198: RV_5,010.01c pra no rāyā parīṇasā ratsi vājāya panthām ||
GV01rv_hn05u:199: RV_5,010.02a tvaṃ no agne adbhuta kratvā dakṣasya maṃhanā |
GV01rv_hn05u:200: RV_5,010.02c tve asuryam āruhat krāṇā mitro na yajñiyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:201: RV_5,010.03a tvaṃ no agna eṣāṃ gayam puṣṭiṃ ca vardhaya |
GV01rv_hn05u:202: RV_5,010.03c ye stomebhiḥ pra sūrayo naro maghāny ānaśuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:203: RV_5,010.04a ye agne candra te giraḥ śumbhanty aśvarādhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:204: RV_5,010.04c śuṣmebhiḥ śuṣmiṇo naro divaś cid yeṣām bṛhat sukīrtir bodhati
GV01rv_hn05u:206: RV_5,010.05a tava tye agne arcayo bhrājanto yanti dhṛṣṇuyā |
GV01rv_hn05u:207: RV_5,010.05c parijmāno na vidyutaḥ svāno ratho na vājayuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:208: RV_5,010.06a nū no agna ūtaye sabādhasaś ca rātaye |
GV01rv_hn05u:209: RV_5,010.06c asmākāsaś ca sūrayo viśvā āśās tarīṣaṇi ||
GV01rv_hn05u:210: RV_5,010.07a tvaṃ no agne aṅgira stuta stavāna ā bhara |
GV01rv_hn05u:211: RV_5,010.07c hotar vibhvāsahaṃ rayiṃ stotṛbhya stavase ca na utaidhi pṛtsu
GV01rv_hn05u:213: RV_5,011.01a janasya gopā ajaniṣṭa jāgṛvir agniḥ sudakṣaḥ suvitāya navyase |
GV01rv_hn05u:214: RV_5,011.01c ghṛtapratīko bṛhatā divispṛśā dyumad vi bhāti bharatebhyaḥ śuciḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:215: RV_5,011.02a yajñasya ketum prathamam purohitam agniṃ naras triṣadhasthe sam īdhire |
GV01rv_hn05u:216: RV_5,011.02c indreṇa devaiḥ sarathaṃ sa barhiṣi sīdan ni hotā yajathāya
GV01rv_hn05u:218: RV_5,011.03a asammṛṣṭo jāyase mātroḥ śucir mandraḥ kavir ud atiṣṭho vivasvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:219: RV_5,011.03c ghṛtena tvāvardhayann agna āhuta dhūmas te ketur abhavad divi
GV01rv_hn05u:221: RV_5,011.04a agnir no yajñam upa vetu sādhuyāgniṃ naro vi bharante
GV01rv_hn05u:223: RV_5,011.04c agnir dūto abhavad dhavyavāhano 'gniṃ vṛṇānā vṛṇate kavikratum ||
GV01rv_hn05u:224: RV_5,011.05a tubhyedam agne madhumattamaṃ vacas tubhyam manīṣā iyam astu śaṃ hṛde |
GV01rv_hn05u:225: RV_5,011.05c tvāṃ giraḥ sindhum ivāvanīr mahīr ā pṛṇanti śavasā vardhayanti ca ||
GV01rv_hn05u:226: RV_5,011.06a tvām agne aṅgiraso guhā hitam anv avindañ chiśriyāṇaṃ vane-vane |
GV01rv_hn05u:227: RV_5,011.06c sa jāyase mathyamānaḥ saho mahat tvām āhuḥ sahasas putram
GV01rv_hn05u:229: RV_5,012.01a prāgnaye bṛhate yajñiyāya ṛtasya vṛṣṇe asurāya manma |
GV01rv_hn05u:230: RV_5,012.01c ghṛtaṃ na yajña āsye supūtaṃ giram bhare vṛṣabhāya pratīcīm
GV01rv_hn05u:231: RV_5,012.02a ṛtaṃ cikitva ṛtam ic cikiddhy ṛtasya dhārā anu tṛndhi pūrvīḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:232: RV_5,012.02c nāhaṃ yātuṃ sahasā na dvayena ṛtaṃ sapāmy aruṣasya vṛṣṇaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:233: RV_5,012.03a kayā no agna ṛtayann ṛtena bhuvo navedā ucathasya navyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:234: RV_5,012.03c vedā me deva ṛtupā ṛtūnāṃ nāham patiṃ sanitur asya rāyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:235: RV_5,012.04a ke te agne ripave bandhanāsaḥ ke pāyavaḥ saniṣanta dyumantaḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:236: RV_5,012.04c ke dhāsim agne anṛtasya pānti ka āsato vacasaḥ santi gopāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:237: RV_5,012.05a sakhāyas te viṣuṇā agna ete śivāsaḥ santo aśivā abhūvan |
GV01rv_hn05u:238: RV_5,012.05c adhūrṣata svayam ete vacobhir ṛjūyate vṛjināni bruvantaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:239: RV_5,012.06a yas te agne namasā yajñam īṭṭa ṛtaṃ sa pāty aruṣasya vṛṣṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:240: RV_5,012.06c tasya kṣayaḥ pṛthur ā sādhur etu prasarsrāṇasya nahuṣasya śeṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:241: RV_5,013.01a arcantas tvā havāmahe 'rcantaḥ sam idhīmahi |
GV01rv_hn05u:243: RV_5,013.02a agne stomam manāmahe sidhram adya divispṛśaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:245: RV_5,013.03a agnir juṣata no giro hotā yo mānuṣeṣv ā |
GV01rv_hn05u:247: RV_5,013.04a tvam agne saprathā asi juṣṭo hotā vareṇyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:249: RV_5,013.05a tvām agne vājasātamaṃ viprā vardhanti suṣṭutam |
GV01rv_hn05u:251: RV_5,013.06a agne nemir arāṃ iva devāṃs tvam paribhūr asi |
GV01rv_hn05u:253: RV_5,014.01a agniṃ stomena bodhaya samidhāno amartyam |
GV01rv_hn05u:255: RV_5,014.02a tam adhvareṣv īḷate devam martā amartyam |
GV01rv_hn05u:257: RV_5,014.03a taṃ hi śaśvanta īḷate srucā devaṃ ghṛtaścutā |
GV01rv_hn05u:259: RV_5,014.04a agnir jāto arocata ghnan dasyūñ jyotiṣā tamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:261: RV_5,014.05a agnim īḷenyaṃ kaviṃ ghṛtapṛṣṭhaṃ saparyata |
GV01rv_hn05u:263: RV_5,014.06a agniṃ ghṛtena vāvṛdhu stomebhir viśvacarṣaṇim |
GV01rv_hn05u:265: RV_5,015.01a pra vedhase kavaye vedyāya giram bhare yaśase pūrvyāya |
GV01rv_hn05u:266: RV_5,015.01c ghṛtaprasatto asuraḥ suśevo rāyo dhartā dharuṇo vasvo agniḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:267: RV_5,015.02a ṛtena ṛtaṃ dharuṇaṃ dhārayanta yajñasya śāke parame vyoman |
GV01rv_hn05u:268: RV_5,015.02c divo dharman dharuṇe seduṣo nṝñ jātair ajātāṃ abhi ye
GV01rv_hn05u:270: RV_5,015.03a aṅhoyuvas tanvas tanvate vi vayo mahad duṣṭaram pūrvyāya |
GV01rv_hn05u:271: RV_5,015.03c sa saṃvato navajātas tuturyāt siṅhaṃ na kruddham abhitaḥ pari
GV01rv_hn05u:273: RV_5,015.04a māteva yad bharase paprathāno janaṃ-janaṃ dhāyase cakṣase ca
GV01rv_hn05u:274: RV_5,015.04c vayo-vayo jarase yad dadhānaḥ pari tmanā viṣurūpo jigāsi ||
GV01rv_hn05u:275: RV_5,015.05a vājo nu te śavasas pātv antam uruṃ doghaṃ dharuṇaṃ deva rāyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:276: RV_5,015.05c padaṃ na tāyur guhā dadhāno maho rāye citayann atrim aspaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:277: RV_5,016.01a bṛhad vayo hi bhānave 'rcā devāyāgnaye |
GV01rv_hn05u:278: RV_5,016.01c yam mitraṃ na praśastibhir martāso dadhire puraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:279: RV_5,016.02a sa hi dyubhir janānāṃ hotā dakṣasya bāhvoḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:280: RV_5,016.02c vi havyam agnir ānuṣag bhago na vāram ṛṇvati ||
GV01rv_hn05u:281: RV_5,016.03a asya stome maghonaḥ sakhye vṛddhaśociṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:282: RV_5,016.03c viśvā yasmin tuviṣvaṇi sam arye śuṣmam ādadhuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:283: RV_5,016.04a adhā hy agna eṣāṃ suvīryasya maṃhanā |
GV01rv_hn05u:284: RV_5,016.04c tam id yahvaṃ na rodasī pari śravo babhūvatuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:285: RV_5,016.05a nū na ehi vāryam agne gṛṇāna ā bhara |
GV01rv_hn05u:286: RV_5,016.05c ye vayaṃ ye ca sūrayaḥ svasti dhāmahe sacotaidhi pṛtsu no vṛdhe ||
GV01rv_hn05u:287: RV_5,017.01a ā yajñair deva martya itthā tavyāṃsam ūtaye |
GV01rv_hn05u:288: RV_5,017.01c agniṃ kṛte svadhvare pūrur īḷītāvase ||
GV01rv_hn05u:289: RV_5,017.02a asya hi svayaśastara āsā vidharman manyase |
GV01rv_hn05u:290: RV_5,017.02c taṃ nākaṃ citraśociṣam mandram paro manīṣayā ||
GV01rv_hn05u:291: RV_5,017.03a asya vāsā u arciṣā ya āyukta tujā girā |
GV01rv_hn05u:292: RV_5,017.03c divo na yasya retasā bṛhac chocanty arcayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:293: RV_5,017.04a asya kratvā vicetaso dasmasya vasu ratha ā |
GV01rv_hn05u:294: RV_5,017.04c adhā viśvāsu havyo 'gnir vikṣu pra śasyate ||
GV01rv_hn05u:295: RV_5,017.05a nū na id dhi vāryam āsā sacanta sūrayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:296: RV_5,017.05c ūrjo napād abhiṣṭaye pāhi śagdhi svastaya utaidhi pṛtsu no
GV01rv_hn05u:298: RV_5,018.01a prātar agniḥ purupriyo viśa stavetātithiḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:299: RV_5,018.01c viśvāni yo amartyo havyā marteṣu raṇyati ||
GV01rv_hn05u:300: RV_5,018.02a dvitāya mṛktavāhase svasya dakṣasya maṃhanā |
GV01rv_hn05u:301: RV_5,018.02c induṃ sa dhatta ānuṣak stotā cit te amartya ||
GV01rv_hn05u:302: RV_5,018.03a taṃ vo dīrghāyuśociṣaṃ girā huve maghonām |
GV01rv_hn05u:303: RV_5,018.03c ariṣṭo yeṣāṃ ratho vy aśvadāvann īyate ||
GV01rv_hn05u:304: RV_5,018.04a citrā vā yeṣu dīdhitir āsann ukthā pānti ye |
GV01rv_hn05u:305: RV_5,018.04b stīrṇam barhiḥ svarṇare śravāṃsi dadhire pari ||
GV01rv_hn05u:306: RV_5,018.05a ye me pañcāśataṃ dadur aśvānāṃ sadhastuti |
GV01rv_hn05u:307: RV_5,018.05b dyumad agne mahi śravo bṛhat kṛdhi maghonāṃ nṛvad amṛta nṛṇām
GV01rv_hn05u:308: RV_5,019.01a abhy avasthāḥ pra jāyante pra vavrer vavriś ciketa |
GV01rv_hn05u:310: RV_5,019.02a juhure vi citayanto 'nimiṣaṃ nṛmṇam pānti |
GV01rv_hn05u:312: RV_5,019.03a ā śvaitreyasya jantavo dyumad vardhanta kṛṣṭayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:313: RV_5,019.03b niṣkagrīvo bṛhaduktha enā madhvā na vājayuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:314: RV_5,019.04a priyaṃ dugdhaṃ na kāmyam ajāmi jāmyoḥ sacā |
GV01rv_hn05u:315: RV_5,019.04c gharmo na vājajaṭharo 'dabdhaḥ śaśvato dabhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:316: RV_5,019.05a krīḷan no raśma ā bhuvaḥ sam bhasmanā vāyunā vevidānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:317: RV_5,019.05b tā asya san dhṛṣajo na tigmāḥ susaṃśitā vakṣyo vakṣaṇesthāḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:318: RV_5,020.01a yam agne vājasātama tvaṃ cin manyase rayim |
GV01rv_hn05u:319: RV_5,020.01c taṃ no gīrbhiḥ śravāyyaṃ devatrā panayā yujam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:320: RV_5,020.02a ye agne nerayanti te vṛddhā ugrasya śavasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:321: RV_5,020.02b apa dveṣo apa hvaro 'nyavratasya saścire ||
GV01rv_hn05u:322: RV_5,020.03a hotāraṃ tvā vṛṇīmahe 'gne dakṣasya sādhanam |
GV01rv_hn05u:323: RV_5,020.03b yajñeṣu pūrvyaṃ girā prayasvanto havāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn05u:324: RV_5,020.04a itthā yathā ta ūtaye sahasāvan dive-dive |
GV01rv_hn05u:325: RV_5,020.04b rāya ṛtāya sukrato gobhiḥ ṣyāma sadhamādo vīraiḥ syāma sadhamādaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:326: RV_5,021.01a manuṣvat tvā ni dhīmahi manuṣvat sam idhīmahi |
GV01rv_hn05u:327: RV_5,021.01c agne manuṣvad aṅgiro devān devayate yaja ||
GV01rv_hn05u:328: RV_5,021.02a tvaṃ hi mānuṣe jane 'gne suprīta idhyase |
GV01rv_hn05u:329: RV_5,021.02c srucas tvā yanty ānuṣak sujāta sarpirāsute ||
GV01rv_hn05u:330: RV_5,021.03a tvāṃ viśve sajoṣaso devāso dūtam akrata |
GV01rv_hn05u:331: RV_5,021.03b saparyantas tvā kave yajñeṣu devam īḷate ||
GV01rv_hn05u:332: RV_5,021.04a devaṃ vo devayajyayāgnim īḷīta martyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:333: RV_5,021.04b samiddhaḥ śukra dīdihy ṛtasya yonim āsadaḥ sasasya yonim āsadaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:334: RV_5,022.01a pra viśvasāmann atrivad arcā pāvakaśociṣe |
GV01rv_hn05u:335: RV_5,022.01c yo adhvareṣv īḍyo hotā mandratamo viśi ||
GV01rv_hn05u:336: RV_5,022.02a ny agniṃ jātavedasaṃ dadhātā devam ṛtvijam |
GV01rv_hn05u:337: RV_5,022.02c pra yajña etv ānuṣag adyā devavyacastamaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:338: RV_5,022.03a cikitvinmanasaṃ tvā devam martāsa ūtaye |
GV01rv_hn05u:340: RV_5,022.04a agne cikiddhy asya na idaṃ vacaḥ sahasya |
GV01rv_hn05u:341: RV_5,022.04c taṃ tvā suśipra dampate stomair vardhanty atrayo gīrbhiḥ śumbhanty atrayaḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:342: RV_5,023.01a agne sahantam ā bhara dyumnasya prāsahā rayim |
GV01rv_hn05u:343: RV_5,023.01c viśvā yaś carṣaṇīr abhy āsā vājeṣu sāsahat ||
GV01rv_hn05u:344: RV_5,023.02a tam agne pṛtanāṣahaṃ rayiṃ sahasva ā bhara |
GV01rv_hn05u:345: RV_5,023.02b tvaṃ hi satyo adbhuto dātā vājasya gomataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:346: RV_5,023.03a viśve hi tvā sajoṣaso janāso vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:347: RV_5,023.03c hotāraṃ sadmasu priyaṃ vyanti vāryā puru ||
GV01rv_hn05u:348: RV_5,023.04a sa hi ṣmā viśvacarṣaṇir abhimāti saho dadhe |
GV01rv_hn05u:349: RV_5,023.04b agna eṣu kṣayeṣv ā revan naḥ śukra dīdihi dyumat pāvaka dīdihi ||
GV01rv_hn05u:350: RV_5,024.01a agne tvaṃ no antama uta trātā śivo bhavā varūthyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:351: RV_5,024.02a vasur agnir vasuśravā acchā nakṣi dyumattamaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:352: RV_5,024.03a sa no bodhi śrudhī havam uruṣyā ṇo aghāyataḥ samasmāt ||
GV01rv_hn05u:353: RV_5,024.04a taṃ tvā śociṣṭha dīdivaḥ sumnāya nūnam īmahe sakhibhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:354: RV_5,025.01a acchā vo agnim avase devaṃ gāsi sa no vasuḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:355: RV_5,025.01c rāsat putra ṛṣūṇām ṛtāvā parṣati dviṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:356: RV_5,025.02a sa hi satyo yam pūrve cid devāsaś cid yam īdhire |
GV01rv_hn05u:357: RV_5,025.02c hotāram mandrajihvam it sudītibhir vibhāvasum ||
GV01rv_hn05u:358: RV_5,025.03a sa no dhītī variṣṭhayā śreṣṭhayā ca sumatyā |
GV01rv_hn05u:359: RV_5,025.03c agne rāyo didīhi naḥ suvṛktibhir vareṇya ||
GV01rv_hn05u:360: RV_5,025.04a agnir deveṣu rājaty agnir marteṣv āviśan |
GV01rv_hn05u:361: RV_5,025.04c agnir no havyavāhano 'gniṃ dhībhiḥ saparyata ||
GV01rv_hn05u:363: RV_5,025.05c atūrtaṃ śrāvayatpatim putraṃ dadāti dāśuṣe ||
GV01rv_hn05u:364: RV_5,025.06a agnir dadāti satpatiṃ sāsāha yo yudhā nṛbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:365: RV_5,025.06c agnir atyaṃ raghuṣyadaṃ jetāram aparājitam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:366: RV_5,025.07a yad vāhiṣṭhaṃ tad agnaye bṛhad arca vibhāvaso |
GV01rv_hn05u:367: RV_5,025.07c mahiṣīva tvad rayis tvad vājā ud īrate ||
GV01rv_hn05u:368: RV_5,025.08a tava dyumanto arcayo grāvevocyate bṛhat |
GV01rv_hn05u:369: RV_5,025.08c uto te tanyatur yathā svāno arta tmanā divaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:370: RV_5,025.09a evāṃ agniṃ vasūyavaḥ sahasānaṃ vavandima |
GV01rv_hn05u:371: RV_5,025.09c sa no viśvā ati dviṣaḥ parṣan nāveva sukratuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:372: RV_5,026.01a agne pāvaka rociṣā mandrayā deva jihvayā |
GV01rv_hn05u:373: RV_5,026.01c ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca ||
GV01rv_hn05u:374: RV_5,026.02a taṃ tvā ghṛtasnav īmahe citrabhāno svardṛśam |
GV01rv_hn05u:376: RV_5,026.03a vītihotraṃ tvā kave dyumantaṃ sam idhīmahi |
GV01rv_hn05u:378: RV_5,026.04a agne viśvebhir ā gahi devebhir havyadātaye |
GV01rv_hn05u:380: RV_5,026.05a yajamānāya sunvata āgne suvīryaṃ vaha |
GV01rv_hn05u:382: RV_5,026.06a samidhānaḥ sahasrajid agne dharmāṇi puṣyasi |
GV01rv_hn05u:384: RV_5,026.07a ny agniṃ jātavedasaṃ hotravāhaṃ yaviṣṭhyam |
GV01rv_hn05u:386: RV_5,026.08a pra yajña etv ānuṣag adyā devavyacastamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:388: RV_5,026.09a edam maruto aśvinā mitraḥ sīdantu varuṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:390: RV_5,027.01a anasvantā satpatir māmahe me gāvā cetiṣṭho asuro maghonaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:391: RV_5,027.01c traivṛṣṇo agne daśabhiḥ sahasrair vaiśvānara tryaruṇaś ciketa
GV01rv_hn05u:392: RV_5,027.02a yo me śatā ca viṃśatiṃ ca gonāṃ harī ca yuktā sudhurā dadāti
GV01rv_hn05u:393: RV_5,027.02c vaiśvānara suṣṭuto vāvṛdhāno 'gne yaccha tryaruṇāya śarma ||
GV01rv_hn05u:394: RV_5,027.03a evā te agne sumatiṃ cakāno naviṣṭhāya navamaṃ trasadasyuḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:395: RV_5,027.03c yo me giras tuvijātasya pūrvīr yuktenābhi tryaruṇo gṛṇāti ||
GV01rv_hn05u:396: RV_5,027.04a yo ma iti pravocaty aśvamedhāya sūraye |
GV01rv_hn05u:397: RV_5,027.04b dadad ṛcā saniṃ yate dadan medhām ṛtāyate ||
GV01rv_hn05u:398: RV_5,027.05a yasya mā paruṣāḥ śatam uddharṣayanty ukṣaṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:399: RV_5,027.05c aśvamedhasya dānāḥ somā iva tryāśiraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:401: RV_5,027.06c kṣatraṃ dhārayatam bṛhad divi sūryam ivājaram ||
GV01rv_hn05u:402: RV_5,028.01a samiddho agnir divi śocir aśret pratyaṅṅ uṣasam urviyā vi
GV01rv_hn05u:404: RV_5,028.01c eti prācī viśvavārā namobhir devāṃ īḷānā haviṣā ghṛtācī ||
GV01rv_hn05u:405: RV_5,028.02a samidhyamāno amṛtasya rājasi haviṣ kṛṇvantaṃ sacase svastaye
GV01rv_hn05u:406: RV_5,028.02c viśvaṃ sa dhatte draviṇaṃ yam invasy ātithyam agne ni ca dhatta it puraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:407: RV_5,028.03a agne śardha mahate saubhagāya tava dyumnāny uttamāni santu |
GV01rv_hn05u:408: RV_5,028.03c saṃ jāspatyaṃ suyamam ā kṛṇuṣva śatrūyatām abhi tiṣṭhā mahāṃsi ||
GV01rv_hn05u:409: RV_5,028.04a samiddhasya pramahaso 'gne vande tava śriyam |
GV01rv_hn05u:410: RV_5,028.04c vṛṣabho dyumnavāṃ asi sam adhvareṣv idhyase ||
GV01rv_hn05u:411: RV_5,028.05a samiddho agna āhuta devān yakṣi svadhvara |
GV01rv_hn05u:413: RV_5,028.06a ā juhotā duvasyatāgnim prayaty adhvare |
GV01rv_hn05u:415: RV_5,029.01a try aryamā manuṣo devatātā trī rocanā divyā dhārayanta |
GV01rv_hn05u:416: RV_5,029.01c arcanti tvā marutaḥ pūtadakṣās tvam eṣām ṛṣir indrāsi dhīraḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:417: RV_5,029.02a anu yad īm maruto mandasānam ārcann indram papivāṃsaṃ sutasya
GV01rv_hn05u:418: RV_5,029.02c ādatta vajram abhi yad ahiṃ hann apo yahvīr asṛjat sartavā u ||
GV01rv_hn05u:419: RV_5,029.03a uta brahmāṇo maruto me asyendraḥ somasya suṣutasya peyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:420: RV_5,029.03c tad dhi havyam manuṣe gā avindad ahann ahim papivāṃ indro asya ||
GV01rv_hn05u:421: RV_5,029.04a ād rodasī vitaraṃ vi ṣkabhāyat saṃvivyānaś cid bhiyase mṛgaṃ
GV01rv_hn05u:423: RV_5,029.04c jigartim indro apajargurāṇaḥ prati śvasantam ava dānavaṃ han ||
GV01rv_hn05u:424: RV_5,029.05a adha kratvā maghavan tubhyaṃ devā anu viśve adaduḥ somapeyam
GV01rv_hn05u:425: RV_5,029.05c yat sūryasya haritaḥ patantīḥ puraḥ satīr uparā etaśe kaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:426: RV_5,029.06a nava yad asya navatiṃ ca bhogān sākaṃ vajreṇa maghavā
GV01rv_hn05u:428: RV_5,029.06c arcantīndram marutaḥ sadhasthe traiṣṭubhena vacasā bādhata
GV01rv_hn05u:430: RV_5,029.07a sakhā sakhye apacat tūyam agnir asya kratvā mahiṣā trī śatāni
GV01rv_hn05u:431: RV_5,029.07c trī sākam indro manuṣaḥ sarāṃsi sutam pibad vṛtrahatyāya somam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:432: RV_5,029.08a trī yac chatā mahiṣāṇām agho mās trī sarāṃsi maghavā somyāpāḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:433: RV_5,029.08c kāraṃ na viśve ahvanta devā bharam indrāya yad ahiṃ jaghāna
GV01rv_hn05u:434: RV_5,029.09a uśanā yat sahasyair ayātaṃ gṛham indra jūjuvānebhir aśvaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:435: RV_5,029.09c vanvāno atra sarathaṃ yayātha kutsena devair avanor ha śuṣṇam
GV01rv_hn05u:436: RV_5,029.10a prānyac cakram avṛhaḥ sūryasya kutsāyānyad varivo yātave 'kaḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:437: RV_5,029.10c anāso dasyūṃr amṛṇo vadhena ni duryoṇa āvṛṇaṅ mṛdhravācaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:438: RV_5,029.11a stomāsas tvā gaurivīter avardhann arandhayo vaidathināya
GV01rv_hn05u:440: RV_5,029.11c ā tvām ṛjiśvā sakhyāya cakre pacan paktīr apibaḥ somam asya
GV01rv_hn05u:441: RV_5,029.12a navagvāsaḥ sutasomāsa indraṃ daśagvāso abhy arcanty arkaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:442: RV_5,029.12c gavyaṃ cid ūrvam apidhānavantaṃ taṃ cin naraḥ śaśamānā apa
GV01rv_hn05u:444: RV_5,029.13a katho nu te pari carāṇi vidvān vīryā maghavan yā cakartha |
GV01rv_hn05u:445: RV_5,029.13c yā co nu navyā kṛṇavaḥ śaviṣṭha pred u tā te vidatheṣu bravāma ||
GV01rv_hn05u:446: RV_5,029.14a etā viśvā cakṛvāṃ indra bhūry aparīto januṣā vīryeṇa |
GV01rv_hn05u:447: RV_5,029.14c yā cin nu vajrin kṛṇavo dadhṛṣvān na te vartā taviṣyā asti tasyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:448: RV_5,029.15a indra brahma kriyamāṇā juṣasva yā te śaviṣṭha navyā akarma |
GV01rv_hn05u:449: RV_5,029.15c vastreva bhadrā sukṛtā vasūyū rathaṃ na dhīraḥ svapā atakṣam
GV01rv_hn05u:450: RV_5,030.01a kva sya vīraḥ ko apaśyad indraṃ sukharatham īyamānaṃ haribhyām |
GV01rv_hn05u:451: RV_5,030.01c yo rāyā vajrī sutasomam icchan tad oko gantā puruhūta ūtī ||
GV01rv_hn05u:452: RV_5,030.02a avācacakṣam padam asya sasvar ugraṃ nidhātur anv āyam icchan
GV01rv_hn05u:453: RV_5,030.02c apṛccham anyāṃ uta te ma āhur indraṃ naro bubudhānā aśema ||
GV01rv_hn05u:454: RV_5,030.03a pra nu vayaṃ sute yā te kṛtānīndra bravāma yāni no jujoṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:455: RV_5,030.03b vedad avidvāñ chṛṇavac ca vidvān vahate 'yam maghavā sarvasenaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:456: RV_5,030.04a sthiram manaś cakṛṣe jāta indra veṣīd eko yudhaye bhūyasaś
GV01rv_hn05u:458: RV_5,030.04b aśmānaṃ cic chavasā didyuto vi vido gavām ūrvam usriyāṇām ||
GV01rv_hn05u:459: RV_5,030.05a paro yat tvam parama ājaniṣṭhāḥ parāvati śrutyaṃ nāma bibhrat
GV01rv_hn05u:460: RV_5,030.05c ataś cid indrād abhayanta devā viśvā apo ajayad dāsapatnīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:461: RV_5,030.06a tubhyed ete marutaḥ suśevā arcanty arkaṃ sunvanty andhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:462: RV_5,030.06c ahim ohānam apa āśayānam pra māyābhir māyinaṃ sakṣad indraḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:463: RV_5,030.07a vi ṣū mṛdho januṣā dānam invann ahan gavā maghavan saṃcakānaḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:464: RV_5,030.07c atrā dāsasya namuceḥ śiro yad avartayo manave gātum icchan ||
GV01rv_hn05u:465: RV_5,030.08a yujaṃ hi mām akṛthā ād id indra śiro dāsasya namucer mathāyan |
GV01rv_hn05u:466: RV_5,030.08c aśmānaṃ cit svaryaṃ vartamānam pra cakriyeva rodasī marudbhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:467: RV_5,030.09a striyo hi dāsa āyudhāni cakre kim mā karann abalā asya senāḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:468: RV_5,030.09c antar hy akhyad ubhe asya dhene athopa praid yudhaye dasyum indraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:469: RV_5,030.10a sam atra gāvo 'bhito 'navanteheha vatsair viyutā yad āsan |
GV01rv_hn05u:470: RV_5,030.10c saṃ tā indro asṛjad asya śākair yad īṃ somāsaḥ suṣutā amandan ||
GV01rv_hn05u:471: RV_5,030.11a yad īṃ somā babhrudhūtā amandann aroravīd vṛṣabhaḥ sādaneṣu |
GV01rv_hn05u:472: RV_5,030.11c purandaraḥ papivāṃ indro asya punar gavām adadād usriyāṇām ||
GV01rv_hn05u:473: RV_5,030.12a bhadram idaṃ ruśamā agne akran gavāṃ catvāri dadataḥ sahasrā
GV01rv_hn05u:474: RV_5,030.12c ṛṇañcayasya prayatā maghāni praty agrabhīṣma nṛtamasya nṛṇām
GV01rv_hn05u:475: RV_5,030.13a supeśasam māva sṛjanty astaṃ gavāṃ sahasrai ruśamāso agne |
GV01rv_hn05u:476: RV_5,030.13c tīvrā indram amamanduḥ sutāso 'ktor vyuṣṭau paritakmyāyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:477: RV_5,030.14a aucchat sā rātrī paritakmyā yāṃ ṛṇañcaye rājani ruśamānām |
GV01rv_hn05u:478: RV_5,030.14c atyo na vājī raghur ajyamāno babhruś catvāry asanat sahasrā
GV01rv_hn05u:479: RV_5,030.15a catuḥsahasraṃ gavyasya paśvaḥ praty agrabhīṣma ruśameṣv agne
GV01rv_hn05u:480: RV_5,030.15c gharmaś cit taptaḥ pravṛje ya āsīd ayasmayas tam v ādāma viprāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:481: RV_5,031.01a indro rathāya pravataṃ kṛṇoti yam adhyasthān maghavā vājayantam |
GV01rv_hn05u:482: RV_5,031.01c yūtheva paśvo vy unoti gopā ariṣṭo yāti prathamaḥ siṣāsan ||
GV01rv_hn05u:483: RV_5,031.02a ā pra drava harivo mā vi venaḥ piśaṅgarāte abhi naḥ sacasva |
GV01rv_hn05u:484: RV_5,031.02c nahi tvad indra vasyo anyad asty amenāṃś cij janivataś
GV01rv_hn05u:486: RV_5,031.03a ud yat sahaḥ sahasa ājaniṣṭa dediṣṭa indra indriyāṇi viśvā |
GV01rv_hn05u:487: RV_5,031.03c prācodayat sudughā vavre antar vi jyotiṣā saṃvavṛtvat tamo 'vaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:488: RV_5,031.04a anavas te ratham aśvāya takṣan tvaṣṭā vajram puruhūta dyumantam |
GV01rv_hn05u:489: RV_5,031.04c brahmāṇa indram mahayanto arkair avardhayann ahaye hantavā u ||
GV01rv_hn05u:490: RV_5,031.05a vṛṣṇe yat te vṛṣaṇo arkam arcān indra grāvāṇo aditiḥ sajoṣāḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:491: RV_5,031.05c anaśvāso ye pavayo 'rathā indreṣitā abhy avartanta dasyūn ||
GV01rv_hn05u:492: RV_5,031.06a pra te pūrvāṇi karaṇāni vocam pra nūtanā maghavan yā cakartha
GV01rv_hn05u:493: RV_5,031.06c śaktīvo yad vibharā rodasī ubhe jayann apo manave dānucitrāḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:494: RV_5,031.07a tad in nu te karaṇaṃ dasma viprāhiṃ yad ghnann ojo atrāmimīthāḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:495: RV_5,031.07c śuṣṇasya cit pari māyā agṛbhṇāḥ prapitvaṃ yann apa dasyūṃr
GV01rv_hn05u:497: RV_5,031.08a tvam apo yadave turvaśāyāramayaḥ sudughāḥ pāra indra |
GV01rv_hn05u:498: RV_5,031.08c ugram ayātam avaho ha kutsaṃ saṃ ha yad vām uśanāranta devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:499: RV_5,031.09a indrākutsā vahamānā rathenā vām atyā api karṇe vahantu |
GV01rv_hn05u:500: RV_5,031.09c niḥ ṣīm adbhyo dhamatho niḥ ṣadhasthān maghono hṛdo varathas
GV01rv_hn05u:502: RV_5,031.10a vātasya yuktān suyujaś cid aśvān kaviś cid eṣo ajagann
GV01rv_hn05u:504: RV_5,031.10c viśve te atra marutaḥ sakhāya indra brahmāṇi taviṣīm avardhan
GV01rv_hn05u:505: RV_5,031.11a sūraś cid ratham paritakmyāyām pūrvaṃ karad uparaṃ jūjuvāṃsam |
GV01rv_hn05u:506: RV_5,031.11c bharac cakram etaśaḥ saṃ riṇāti puro dadhat saniṣyati kratuṃ
GV01rv_hn05u:508: RV_5,031.12a āyaṃ janā abhicakṣe jagāmendraḥ sakhāyaṃ sutasomam icchan |
GV01rv_hn05u:509: RV_5,031.12c vadan grāvāva vedim bhriyāte yasya jīram adhvaryavaś caranti ||
GV01rv_hn05u:510: RV_5,031.13a ye cākananta cākananta nū te martā amṛta mo te aṃha āran |
GV01rv_hn05u:511: RV_5,031.13c vāvandhi yajyūṃr uta teṣu dhehy ojo janeṣu yeṣu te syāma ||
GV01rv_hn05u:512: RV_5,032.01a adardar utsam asṛjo vi khāni tvam arṇavān badbadhānāṃ aramṇāḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:513: RV_5,032.01c mahāntam indra parvataṃ vi yad vaḥ sṛjo vi dhārā ava dānavaṃ han ||
GV01rv_hn05u:514: RV_5,032.02a tvam utsāṃ ṛtubhir badbadhānāṃ araṃha ūdhaḥ parvatasya vajrin |
GV01rv_hn05u:515: RV_5,032.02c ahiṃ cid ugra prayutaṃ śayānaṃ jaghanvāṃ indra taviṣīm adhatthāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:516: RV_5,032.03a tyasya cin mahato nir mṛgasya vadhar jaghāna taviṣībhir indraḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:517: RV_5,032.03c ya eka id apratir manyamāna ād asmād anyo ajaniṣṭa tavyān ||
GV01rv_hn05u:518: RV_5,032.04a tyaṃ cid eṣāṃ svadhayā madantam miho napātaṃ suvṛdhaṃ tamogām
GV01rv_hn05u:519: RV_5,032.04c vṛṣaprabharmā dānavasya bhāmaṃ vajreṇa vajrī ni jaghāna śuṣṇam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:520: RV_5,032.05a tyaṃ cid asya kratubhir niṣattam amarmaṇo vidad id asya marma
GV01rv_hn05u:521: RV_5,032.05c yad īṃ sukṣatra prabhṛtā madasya yuyutsantaṃ tamasi harmye dhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:522: RV_5,032.06a tyaṃ cid itthā katpayaṃ śayānam asūrye tamasi vāvṛdhānam |
GV01rv_hn05u:523: RV_5,032.06c taṃ cin mandāno vṛṣabhaḥ sutasyoccair indro apagūryā jaghāna ||
GV01rv_hn05u:524: RV_5,032.07a ud yad indro mahate dānavāya vadhar yamiṣṭa saho apratītam |
GV01rv_hn05u:525: RV_5,032.07c yad īṃ vajrasya prabhṛtau dadābha viśvasya jantor adhamaṃ cakāra ||
GV01rv_hn05u:526: RV_5,032.08a tyaṃ cid arṇam madhupaṃ śayānam asinvaṃ vavram mahy ādad
GV01rv_hn05u:528: RV_5,032.08c apādam atram mahatā vadhena ni duryoṇa āvṛṇaṅ mṛdhravācam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:529: RV_5,032.09a ko asya śuṣmaṃ taviṣīṃ varāta eko dhanā bharate apratītaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:530: RV_5,032.09c ime cid asya jrayaso nu devī indrasyaujaso bhiyasā jihāte ||
GV01rv_hn05u:531: RV_5,032.10a ny asmai devī svadhitir jihīta indrāya gātur uśatīva yeme |
GV01rv_hn05u:532: RV_5,032.10c saṃ yad ojo yuvate viśvam ābhir anu svadhāvne kṣitayo namanta
GV01rv_hn05u:533: RV_5,032.11a ekaṃ nu tvā satpatim pāñcajanyaṃ jātaṃ śṛṇomi yaśasaṃ janeṣu
GV01rv_hn05u:534: RV_5,032.11c tam me jagṛbhra āśaso naviṣṭhaṃ doṣā vastor havamānāsa indram
GV01rv_hn05u:535: RV_5,032.12a evā hi tvām ṛtuthā yātayantam maghā viprebhyo dadataṃ śṛṇomi
GV01rv_hn05u:536: RV_5,032.12c kiṃ te brahmāṇo gṛhate sakhāyo ye tvāyā nidadhuḥ kāmam indra
GV01rv_hn05u:537: RV_5,033.01a mahi mahe tavase dīdhye nṝn indrāyetthā tavase atavyān |
GV01rv_hn05u:538: RV_5,033.01c yo asmai sumatiṃ vājasātau stuto jane samaryaś ciketa ||
GV01rv_hn05u:539: RV_5,033.02a sa tvaṃ na indra dhiyasāno arkair harīṇāṃ vṛṣan yoktram aśreḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:540: RV_5,033.02c yā itthā maghavann anu joṣaṃ vakṣo abhi prāryaḥ sakṣi janān
GV01rv_hn05u:541: RV_5,033.03a na te ta indrābhy asmad ṛṣvāyuktāso abrahmatā yad asan |
GV01rv_hn05u:542: RV_5,033.03c tiṣṭhā ratham adhi taṃ vajrahastā raśmiṃ deva yamase svaśvaḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:543: RV_5,033.04a purū yat ta indra santy ukthā gave cakarthorvarāsu yudhyan |
GV01rv_hn05u:544: RV_5,033.04c tatakṣe sūryāya cid okasi sve vṛṣā samatsu dāsasya nāma cit
GV01rv_hn05u:545: RV_5,033.05a vayaṃ te ta indra ye ca naraḥ śardho jajñānā yātāś ca rathāḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:546: RV_5,033.05c āsmāñ jagamyād ahiśuṣma satvā bhago na havyaḥ prabhṛtheṣu cāruḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:547: RV_5,033.06a papṛkṣeṇyam indra tve hy ojo nṛmṇāni ca nṛtamāno amartaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:548: RV_5,033.06c sa na enīṃ vasavāno rayiṃ dāḥ prārya stuṣe tuvimaghasya dānam
GV01rv_hn05u:549: RV_5,033.07a evā na indrotibhir ava pāhi gṛṇataḥ śūra kārūn |
GV01rv_hn05u:550: RV_5,033.07c uta tvacaṃ dadato vājasātau piprīhi madhvaḥ suṣutasya cāroḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:551: RV_5,033.08a uta tye mā paurukutsyasya sūres trasadasyor hiraṇino rarāṇāḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:552: RV_5,033.08c vahantu mā daśa śyetāso asya gairikṣitasya kratubhir nu saśce
GV01rv_hn05u:553: RV_5,033.09a uta tye mā mārutāśvasya śoṇāḥ kratvāmaghāso vidathasya rātau |
GV01rv_hn05u:554: RV_5,033.09c sahasrā me cyavatāno dadāna ānūkam aryo vapuṣe nārcat ||
GV01rv_hn05u:555: RV_5,033.10a uta tye mā dhvanyasya juṣṭā lakṣmaṇyasya suruco yatānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:556: RV_5,033.10c mahnā rāyaḥ saṃvaraṇasya ṛṣer vrajaṃ na gāvaḥ prayatā api
GV01rv_hn05u:558: RV_5,034.01a ajātaśatrum ajarā svarvaty anu svadhāmitā dasmam īyate |
GV01rv_hn05u:559: RV_5,034.01c sunotana pacata brahmavāhase puruṣṭutāya prataraṃ dadhātana
GV01rv_hn05u:560: RV_5,034.02a ā yaḥ somena jaṭharam apipratāmandata maghavā madhvo andhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:561: RV_5,034.02c yad īm mṛgāya hantave mahāvadhaḥ sahasrabhṛṣṭim uśanā vadhaṃ yamat ||
GV01rv_hn05u:562: RV_5,034.03a yo asmai ghraṃsa uta vā ya ūdhani somaṃ sunoti bhavati dyumāṃ aha |
GV01rv_hn05u:563: RV_5,034.03c apāpa śakras tatanuṣṭim ūhati tanūśubhram maghavā yaḥ kavāsakhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:564: RV_5,034.04a yasyāvadhīt pitaraṃ yasya mātaraṃ yasya śakro bhrātaraṃ nāta īṣate |
GV01rv_hn05u:565: RV_5,034.04c vetīd v asya prayatā yataṅkaro na kilbiṣād īṣate vasva ākaraḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:566: RV_5,034.05a na pañcabhir daśabhir vaṣṭy ārabhaṃ nāsunvatā sacate puṣyatā cana |
GV01rv_hn05u:567: RV_5,034.05c jināti ved amuyā hanti vā dhunir ā devayum bhajati gomati vraje ||
GV01rv_hn05u:568: RV_5,034.06a vitvakṣaṇaḥ samṛtau cakramāsajo 'sunvato viṣuṇaḥ sunvato vṛdhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:569: RV_5,034.06c indro viśvasya damitā vibhīṣaṇo yathāvaśaṃ nayati dāsam āryaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:570: RV_5,034.07a sam īm paṇer ajati bhojanam muṣe vi dāśuṣe bhajati sūnaraṃ vasu |
GV01rv_hn05u:571: RV_5,034.07c durge cana dhriyate viśva ā puru jano yo asya taviṣīm acukrudhat ||
GV01rv_hn05u:572: RV_5,034.08a saṃ yaj janau sudhanau viśvaśardhasāv aved indro maghavā goṣu
GV01rv_hn05u:574: RV_5,034.08c yujaṃ hy anyam akṛta pravepany ud īṃ gavyaṃ sṛjate satvabhir dhuniḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:575: RV_5,034.09a sahasrasām āgniveśiṃ gṛṇīṣe śatrim agna upamāṃ ketum aryaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:576: RV_5,034.09c tasmā āpaḥ saṃyataḥ pīpayanta tasmin kṣatram amavat tveṣam astu ||
GV01rv_hn05u:577: RV_5,035.01a yas te sādhiṣṭho 'vasa indra kratuṣ ṭam ā bhara |
GV01rv_hn05u:578: RV_5,035.01c asmabhyaṃ carṣaṇīsahaṃ sasniṃ vājeṣu duṣṭaram ||
GV01rv_hn05u:579: RV_5,035.02a yad indra te catasro yac chūra santi tisraḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:580: RV_5,035.02c yad vā pañca kṣitīnām avas tat su na ā bhara ||
GV01rv_hn05u:581: RV_5,035.03a ā te 'vo vareṇyaṃ vṛṣantamasya hūmahe |
GV01rv_hn05u:582: RV_5,035.03c vṛṣajūtir hi jajñiṣa ābhūbhir indra turvaṇiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:583: RV_5,035.04a vṛṣā hy asi rādhase jajñiṣe vṛṣṇi te śavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:584: RV_5,035.04c svakṣatraṃ te dhṛṣan manaḥ satrāham indra pauṃsyam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:585: RV_5,035.05a tvaṃ tam indra martyam amitrayantam adrivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:586: RV_5,035.05c sarvarathā śatakrato ni yāhi śavasas pate ||
GV01rv_hn05u:587: RV_5,035.06a tvām id vṛtrahantama janāso vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:588: RV_5,035.06c ugram pūrvīṣu pūrvyaṃ havante vājasātaye ||
GV01rv_hn05u:589: RV_5,035.07a asmākam indra duṣṭaram puroyāvānam ājiṣu |
GV01rv_hn05u:590: RV_5,035.07c sayāvānaṃ dhane-dhane vājayantam avā ratham ||
GV01rv_hn05u:591: RV_5,035.08a asmākam indrehi no ratham avā purandhyā |
GV01rv_hn05u:592: RV_5,035.08c vayaṃ śaviṣṭha vāryaṃ divi śravo dadhīmahi divi stomam manāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn05u:593: RV_5,036.01a sa ā gamad indro yo vasūnāṃ ciketad dātuṃ dāmano rayīṇām |
GV01rv_hn05u:594: RV_5,036.01c dhanvacaro na vaṃsagas tṛṣāṇaś cakamānaḥ pibatu dugdham aṃśum ||
GV01rv_hn05u:595: RV_5,036.02a ā te hanū harivaḥ śūra śipre ruhat somo na parvatasya pṛṣṭhe |
GV01rv_hn05u:596: RV_5,036.02c anu tvā rājann arvato na hinvan gīrbhir madema puruhūta viśve
GV01rv_hn05u:597: RV_5,036.03a cakraṃ na vṛttam puruhūta vepate mano bhiyā me amater id adrivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:598: RV_5,036.03c rathād adhi tvā jaritā sadāvṛdha kuvin nu stoṣan maghavan
GV01rv_hn05u:600: RV_5,036.04a eṣa grāveva jaritā ta indreyarti vācam bṛhad āśuṣāṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:601: RV_5,036.04c pra savyena maghavan yaṃsi rāyaḥ pra dakṣiṇid dharivo mā vi venaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:602: RV_5,036.05a vṛṣā tvā vṛṣaṇaṃ vardhatu dyaur vṛṣā vṛṣabhyāṃ vahase haribhyām |
GV01rv_hn05u:603: RV_5,036.05c sa no vṛṣā vṛṣarathaḥ suśipra vṛṣakrato vṛṣā vajrin bhare
GV01rv_hn05u:605: RV_5,036.06a yo rohitau vājinau vājinīvān tribhiḥ śataiḥ sacamānāv adiṣṭa |
GV01rv_hn05u:606: RV_5,036.06c yūne sam asmai kṣitayo namantāṃ śrutarathāya maruto duvoyā ||
GV01rv_hn05u:607: RV_5,037.01a sam bhānunā yatate sūryasyājuhvāno ghṛtapṛṣṭhaḥ svañcāḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:608: RV_5,037.01c tasmā amṛdhrā uṣaso vy ucchān ya indrāya sunavāmety āha ||
GV01rv_hn05u:609: RV_5,037.02a samiddhāgnir vanavat stīrṇabarhir yuktagrāvā sutasomo jarāte
GV01rv_hn05u:610: RV_5,037.02c grāvāṇo yasyeṣiraṃ vadanty ayad adhvaryur haviṣāva sindhum ||
GV01rv_hn05u:611: RV_5,037.03a vadhūr iyam patim icchanty eti ya īṃ vahāte mahiṣīm iṣirām |
GV01rv_hn05u:612: RV_5,037.03c āsya śravasyād ratha ā ca ghoṣāt purū sahasrā pari vartayāte
GV01rv_hn05u:613: RV_5,037.04a na sa rājā vyathate yasminn indras tīvraṃ somam pibati
GV01rv_hn05u:615: RV_5,037.04c ā satvanair ajati hanti vṛtraṃ kṣeti kṣitīḥ subhago nāma
GV01rv_hn05u:617: RV_5,037.05a puṣyāt kṣeme abhi yoge bhavāty ubhe vṛtau saṃyatī saṃ jayāti
GV01rv_hn05u:618: RV_5,037.05c priyaḥ sūrye priyo agnā bhavāti ya indrāya sutasomo dadāśat
GV01rv_hn05u:619: RV_5,038.01a uroṣ ṭa indra rādhaso vibhvī rātiḥ śatakrato |
GV01rv_hn05u:620: RV_5,038.01c adhā no viśvacarṣaṇe dyumnā sukṣatra maṃhaya ||
GV01rv_hn05u:621: RV_5,038.02a yad īm indra śravāyyam iṣaṃ śaviṣṭha dadhiṣe |
GV01rv_hn05u:623: RV_5,038.03a śuṣmāso ye te adrivo mehanā ketasāpaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:624: RV_5,038.03c ubhā devāv abhiṣṭaye divaś ca gmaś ca rājathaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:625: RV_5,038.04a uto no asya kasya cid dakṣasya tava vṛtrahan |
GV01rv_hn05u:626: RV_5,038.04c asmabhyaṃ nṛmṇam ā bharāsmabhyaṃ nṛmaṇasyase ||
GV01rv_hn05u:627: RV_5,038.05a nū ta ābhir abhiṣṭibhis tava śarmañ chatakrato |
GV01rv_hn05u:628: RV_5,038.05c indra syāma sugopāḥ śūra syāma sugopāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:629: RV_5,039.01a yad indra citra mehanāsti tvādātam adrivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:630: RV_5,039.01c rādhas tan no vidadvasa ubhayāhasty ā bhara ||
GV01rv_hn05u:631: RV_5,039.02a yan manyase vareṇyam indra dyukṣaṃ tad ā bhara |
GV01rv_hn05u:632: RV_5,039.02c vidyāma tasya te vayam akūpārasya dāvane ||
GV01rv_hn05u:633: RV_5,039.03a yat te ditsu prarādhyam mano asti śrutam bṛhat |
GV01rv_hn05u:634: RV_5,039.03c tena dṛḷhā cid adriva ā vājaṃ darṣi sātaye ||
GV01rv_hn05u:635: RV_5,039.04a maṃhiṣṭhaṃ vo maghonāṃ rājānaṃ carṣaṇīnām |
GV01rv_hn05u:636: RV_5,039.04c indram upa praśastaye pūrvībhir jujuṣe giraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:637: RV_5,039.05a asmā it kāvyaṃ vaca uktham indrāya śaṃsyam |
GV01rv_hn05u:638: RV_5,039.05c tasmā u brahmavāhase giro vardhanty atrayo giraḥ śumbhanty atrayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:639: RV_5,040.01a ā yāhy adribhiḥ sutaṃ somaṃ somapate piba |
GV01rv_hn05u:641: RV_5,040.02a vṛṣā grāvā vṛṣā mado vṛṣā somo ayaṃ sutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:643: RV_5,040.03a vṛṣā tvā vṛṣaṇaṃ huve vajriñ citrābhir ūtibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:645: RV_5,040.04a ṛjīṣī vajrī vṛṣabhas turāṣāṭ chuṣmī rājā vṛtrahā somapāvā |
GV01rv_hn05u:646: RV_5,040.04c yuktvā haribhyām upa yāsad arvāṅ mādhyandine savane matsad indraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:647: RV_5,040.05a yat tvā sūrya svarbhānus tamasāvidhyad āsuraḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:648: RV_5,040.05c akṣetravid yathā mugdho bhuvanāny adīdhayuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:649: RV_5,040.06a svarbhānor adha yad indra māyā avo divo vartamānā avāhan |
GV01rv_hn05u:650: RV_5,040.06c gūḷhaṃ sūryaṃ tamasāpavratena turīyeṇa brahmaṇāvindad atriḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:651: RV_5,040.07a mā mām imaṃ tava santam atra irasyā drugdho bhiyasā ni gārīt |
GV01rv_hn05u:652: RV_5,040.07c tvam mitro asi satyarādhās tau mehāvataṃ varuṇaś ca rājā ||
GV01rv_hn05u:653: RV_5,040.08a grāvṇo brahmā yuyujānaḥ saparyan kīriṇā devān namasopaśikṣan
GV01rv_hn05u:654: RV_5,040.08c atriḥ sūryasya divi cakṣur ādhāt svarbhānor apa māyā aghukṣat
GV01rv_hn05u:655: RV_5,040.09a yaṃ vai sūryaṃ svarbhānus tamasāvidhyad āsuraḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:656: RV_5,040.09c atrayas tam anv avindan nahy anye aśaknuvan ||
GV01rv_hn05u:657: RV_5,041.01a ko nu vām mitrāvaruṇāv ṛtāyan divo vā mahaḥ pārthivasya vā de |
GV01rv_hn05u:658: RV_5,041.01c ṛtasya vā sadasi trāsīthāṃ no yajñāyate vā paśuṣo na vājān ||
GV01rv_hn05u:659: RV_5,041.02a te no mitro varuṇo aryamāyur indra ṛbhukṣā maruto juṣanta |
GV01rv_hn05u:660: RV_5,041.02c namobhir vā ye dadhate suvṛktiṃ stomaṃ rudrāya mīḷhuṣe sajoṣāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:661: RV_5,041.03a ā vāṃ yeṣṭhāśvinā huvadhyai vātasya patman rathyasya puṣṭau |
GV01rv_hn05u:662: RV_5,041.03c uta vā divo asurāya manma prāndhāṃsīva yajyave bharadhvam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:663: RV_5,041.04a pra sakṣaṇo divyaḥ kaṇvahotā trito divaḥ sajoṣā vāto agniḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:664: RV_5,041.04c pūṣā bhagaḥ prabhṛthe viśvabhojā ājiṃ na jagmur āśvaśvatamāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:665: RV_5,041.05a pra vo rayiṃ yuktāśvam bharadhvaṃ rāya eṣe 'vase dadhīta dhīḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:666: RV_5,041.05c suśeva evair auśijasya hotā ye va evā marutas turāṇām ||
GV01rv_hn05u:667: RV_5,041.06a pra vo vāyuṃ rathayujaṃ kṛṇudhvam pra devaṃ vipram panitāram
GV01rv_hn05u:669: RV_5,041.06c iṣudhyava ṛtasāpaḥ purandhīr vasvīr no atra patnīr ā dhiye
GV01rv_hn05u:671: RV_5,041.07a upa va eṣe vandyebhiḥ śūṣaiḥ pra yahvī divaś citayadbhir
GV01rv_hn05u:673: RV_5,041.07c uṣāsānaktā viduṣīva viśvam ā hā vahato martyāya yajñam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:674: RV_5,041.08a abhi vo arce poṣyāvato nṝn vāstoṣ patiṃ tvaṣṭāraṃ rarāṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:675: RV_5,041.08c dhanyā sajoṣā dhiṣaṇā namobhir vanaspatīṃr oṣadhī rāya eṣe ||
GV01rv_hn05u:676: RV_5,041.09a tuje nas tane parvatāḥ santu svaitavo ye vasavo na vīrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:677: RV_5,041.09c panita āptyo yajataḥ sadā no vardhān naḥ śaṃsaṃ naryo
GV01rv_hn05u:679: RV_5,041.10a vṛṣṇo astoṣi bhūmyasya garbhaṃ trito napātam apāṃ suvṛkti |
GV01rv_hn05u:680: RV_5,041.10c gṛṇīte agnir etarī na śūṣaiḥ śociṣkeśo ni riṇāti vanā ||
GV01rv_hn05u:681: RV_5,041.11a kathā mahe rudriyāya bravāma kad rāye cikituṣe bhagāya |
GV01rv_hn05u:682: RV_5,041.11c āpa oṣadhīr uta no 'vantu dyaur vanā girayo vṛkṣakeśāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:683: RV_5,041.12a śṛṇotu na ūrjām patir giraḥ sa nabhas tarīyāṃ iṣiraḥ parijmā
GV01rv_hn05u:684: RV_5,041.12c śṛṇvantv āpaḥ puro na śubhrāḥ pari sruco babṛhāṇasyādreḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:685: RV_5,041.13a vidā cin nu mahānto ye va evā bravāma dasmā vāryaṃ dadhānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:686: RV_5,041.13c vayaś cana subhva āva yanti kṣubhā martam anuyataṃ vadhasnaiḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:687: RV_5,041.14a ā daivyāni pārthivāni janmāpaś cācchā sumakhāya vocam |
GV01rv_hn05u:688: RV_5,041.14c vardhantāṃ dyāvo giraś candrāgrā udā vardhantām abhiṣātā arṇāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:689: RV_5,041.15a pade-pade me jarimā ni dhāyi varūtrī vā śakrā yā pāyubhiś ca
GV01rv_hn05u:690: RV_5,041.15c siṣaktu mātā mahī rasā naḥ smat sūribhir ṛjuhasta ṛjuvaniḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:691: RV_5,041.16a kathā dāśema namasā sudānūn evayā maruto acchoktau praśravaso maruto acchoktau
GV01rv_hn05u:692: RV_5,041.16c mā no 'hir budhnyo riṣe dhād asmākam bhūd upamātivaniḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:693: RV_5,041.17a iti cin nu prajāyai paśumatyai devāso vanate martyo va ā devāso vanate martyo vaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:694: RV_5,041.17c atrā śivāṃ tanvo dhāsim asyā jarāṃ cin me nirṛtir jagrasīta
GV01rv_hn05u:695: RV_5,041.18a tāṃ vo devāḥ sumatim ūrjayantīm iṣam aśyāma vasavaḥ śasā goḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:696: RV_5,041.18c sā naḥ sudānur mṛḷayantī devī prati dravantī suvitāya gamyāḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:697: RV_5,041.19a abhi na iḷā yūthasya mātā sman nadībhir urvaśī vā gṛṇātu |
GV01rv_hn05u:698: RV_5,041.19c urvaśī vā bṛhaddivā gṛṇānābhyūrṇvānā prabhṛthasyāyoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:700: RV_5,042.01a pra śantamā varuṇaṃ dīdhitī gīr mitram bhagam aditiṃ nūnam
GV01rv_hn05u:702: RV_5,042.01c pṛṣadyoniḥ pañcahotā śṛṇotv atūrtapanthā asuro mayobhuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:703: RV_5,042.02a prati me stomam aditir jagṛbhyāt sūnuṃ na mātā hṛdyaṃ suśevam
GV01rv_hn05u:704: RV_5,042.02c brahma priyaṃ devahitaṃ yad asty aham mitre varuṇe yan
GV01rv_hn05u:706: RV_5,042.03a ud īraya kavitamaṃ kavīnām unattainam abhi madhvā ghṛtena |
GV01rv_hn05u:707: RV_5,042.03c sa no vasūni prayatā hitāni candrāṇi devaḥ savitā suvāti ||
GV01rv_hn05u:708: RV_5,042.04a sam indra ṇo manasā neṣi gobhiḥ saṃ sūribhir harivaḥ saṃ svasti |
GV01rv_hn05u:709: RV_5,042.04c sam brahmaṇā devahitaṃ yad asti saṃ devānāṃ sumatyā yajñiyānām ||
GV01rv_hn05u:710: RV_5,042.05a devo bhagaḥ savitā rāyo aṃśa indro vṛtrasya saṃjito dhanānām
GV01rv_hn05u:711: RV_5,042.05c ṛbhukṣā vāja uta vā purandhir avantu no amṛtāsas turāsaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:712: RV_5,042.06a marutvato apratītasya jiṣṇor ajūryataḥ pra bravāmā kṛtāni |
GV01rv_hn05u:713: RV_5,042.06c na te pūrve maghavan nāparāso na vīryaṃ nūtanaḥ kaś canāpa ||
GV01rv_hn05u:714: RV_5,042.07a upa stuhi prathamaṃ ratnadheyam bṛhaspatiṃ sanitāraṃ dhanānām
GV01rv_hn05u:715: RV_5,042.07c yaḥ śaṃsate stuvate śambhaviṣṭhaḥ purūvasur āgamaj johuvānam
GV01rv_hn05u:716: RV_5,042.08a tavotibhiḥ sacamānā ariṣṭā bṛhaspate maghavānaḥ suvīrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:717: RV_5,042.08c ye aśvadā uta vā santi godā ye vastradāḥ subhagās teṣu rāyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:718: RV_5,042.09a visarmāṇaṃ kṛṇuhi vittam eṣāṃ ye bhuñjate apṛṇanto na ukthaiḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:719: RV_5,042.09c apavratān prasave vāvṛdhānān brahmadviṣaḥ sūryād yāvayasva ||
GV01rv_hn05u:720: RV_5,042.10a ya ohate rakṣaso devavītāv acakrebhis tam maruto ni yāta |
GV01rv_hn05u:721: RV_5,042.10c yo vaḥ śamīṃ śaśamānasya nindāt tucchyān kāmān karate siṣvidānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:722: RV_5,042.11a tam u ṣṭuhi yaḥ sviṣuḥ sudhanvā yo viśvasya kṣayati
GV01rv_hn05u:724: RV_5,042.11c yakṣvā mahe saumanasāya rudraṃ namobhir devam asuraṃ duvasya ||
GV01rv_hn05u:725: RV_5,042.12a damūnaso apaso ye suhastā vṛṣṇaḥ patnīr nadyo vibhvataṣṭāḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:726: RV_5,042.12c sarasvatī bṛhaddivota rākā daśasyantīr varivasyantu śubhrāḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:727: RV_5,042.13a pra sū mahe suśaraṇāya medhāṃ giram bhare navyasīṃ jāyamānām
GV01rv_hn05u:728: RV_5,042.13c ya āhanā duhitur vakṣaṇāsu rūpā mināno akṛṇod idaṃ naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:729: RV_5,042.14a pra suṣṭuti stanayantaṃ ruvantam iḷas patiṃ jaritar nūnam aśyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:730: RV_5,042.14c yo abdimāṃ udanimāṃ iyarti pra vidyutā rodasī ukṣamāṇaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:731: RV_5,042.15a eṣa stomo mārutaṃ śardho acchā rudrasya sūnūṃr yuvanyūṃr ud
GV01rv_hn05u:733: RV_5,042.15c kāmo rāye havate mā svasty upa stuhi pṛṣadaśvāṃ ayāsaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:734: RV_5,042.16a praiṣa stomaḥ pṛthivīm antarikṣaṃ vanaspatīṃr oṣadhī rāye aśyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:735: RV_5,042.16c devo-devaḥ suhavo bhūtu mahyam mā no mātā pṛthivī durmatau dhāt ||
GV01rv_hn05u:737: RV_5,042.18a sam aśvinor avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā supraṇītī gamema |
GV01rv_hn05u:738: RV_5,042.18c ā no rayiṃ vahatam ota vīrān ā viśvāny amṛtā saubhagāni ||
GV01rv_hn05u:739: RV_5,043.01a ā dhenavaḥ payasā tūrṇyarthā amardhantīr upa no yantu madhvā
GV01rv_hn05u:740: RV_5,043.01c maho rāye bṛhatīḥ sapta vipro mayobhuvo jaritā johavīti ||
GV01rv_hn05u:741: RV_5,043.02a ā suṣṭutī namasā vartayadhyai dyāvā vājāya pṛthivī amṛdhre |
GV01rv_hn05u:742: RV_5,043.02c pitā mātā madhuvacāḥ suhastā bhare-bhare no yaśasāv aviṣṭām
GV01rv_hn05u:743: RV_5,043.03a adhvaryavaś cakṛvāṃso madhūni pra vāyave bharata cāru śukram |
GV01rv_hn05u:744: RV_5,043.03c hoteva naḥ prathamaḥ pāhy asya deva madhvo rarimā te madāya
GV01rv_hn05u:745: RV_5,043.04a daśa kṣipo yuñjate bāhū adriṃ somasya yā śamitārā suhastā |
GV01rv_hn05u:746: RV_5,043.04c madhvo rasaṃ sugabhastir giriṣṭhāṃ caniścadad duduhe śukram aṃśuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:747: RV_5,043.05a asāvi te jujuṣāṇāya somaḥ kratve dakṣāya bṛhate madāya |
GV01rv_hn05u:748: RV_5,043.05c harī rathe sudhurā yoge arvāg indra priyā kṛṇuhi hūyamānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:749: RV_5,043.06a ā no mahīm aramatiṃ sajoṣā gnāṃ devīṃ namasā rātahavyām |
GV01rv_hn05u:750: RV_5,043.06c madhor madāya bṛhatīm ṛtajñām āgne vaha pathibhir devayānaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:751: RV_5,043.07a añjanti yam prathayanto na viprā vapāvantaṃ nāgninā tapantaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:752: RV_5,043.07c pitur na putra upasi preṣṭha ā gharmo agnim ṛtayann asādi ||
GV01rv_hn05u:753: RV_5,043.08a acchā mahī bṛhatī śantamā gīr dūto na gantv aśvinā huvadhyai
GV01rv_hn05u:754: RV_5,043.08c mayobhuvā sarathā yātam arvāg gantaṃ nidhiṃ dhuram āṇir na
GV01rv_hn05u:756: RV_5,043.09a pra tavyaso namauktiṃ turasyāham pūṣṇa uta vāyor adikṣi |
GV01rv_hn05u:757: RV_5,043.09c yā rādhasā coditārā matīnāṃ yā vājasya draviṇodā uta tman ||
GV01rv_hn05u:758: RV_5,043.10a ā nāmabhir maruto vakṣi viśvān ā rūpebhir jātavedo huvānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:759: RV_5,043.10c yajñaṃ giro jarituḥ suṣṭutiṃ ca viśve ganta maruto viśva ūtī
GV01rv_hn05u:760: RV_5,043.11a ā no divo bṛhataḥ parvatād ā sarasvatī yajatā gantu yajñam |
GV01rv_hn05u:761: RV_5,043.11c havaṃ devī jujuṣāṇā ghṛtācī śagmāṃ no vācam uśatī śṛṇotu ||
GV01rv_hn05u:762: RV_5,043.12a ā vedhasaṃ nīlapṛṣṭham bṛhantam bṛhaspatiṃ sadane sādayadhvam
GV01rv_hn05u:763: RV_5,043.12c sādadyoniṃ dama ā dīdivāṃsaṃ hiraṇyavarṇam aruṣaṃ sapema ||
GV01rv_hn05u:764: RV_5,043.13a ā dharṇasir bṛhaddivo rarāṇo viśvebhir gantv omabhir huvānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:765: RV_5,043.13c gnā vasāna oṣadhīr amṛdhras tridhātuśṛṅgo vṛṣabho vayodhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:766: RV_5,043.14a mātuṣ pade parame śukra āyor vipanyavo rāspirāso agman |
GV01rv_hn05u:767: RV_5,043.14c suśevyaṃ namasā rātahavyāḥ śiśum mṛjanty āyavo na vāse ||
GV01rv_hn05u:768: RV_5,043.15a bṛhad vayo bṛhate tubhyam agne dhiyājuro mithunāsaḥ sacanta |
GV01rv_hn05u:769: RV_5,043.15c devo-devaḥ suhavo bhūtu mahyam mā no mātā pṛthivī durmatau dhāt ||
GV01rv_hn05u:771: RV_5,043.17a sam aśvinor avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā supraṇītī gamema |
GV01rv_hn05u:772: RV_5,043.17c ā no rayiṃ vahatam ota vīrān ā viśvāny amṛtā saubhagāni ||
GV01rv_hn05u:773: RV_5,044.01a tam pratnathā pūrvathā viśvathemathā jyeṣṭhatātim barhiṣadaṃ
GV01rv_hn05u:775: RV_5,044.01c pratīcīnaṃ vṛjanaṃ dohase girāśuṃ jayantam anu yāsu vardhase ||
GV01rv_hn05u:776: RV_5,044.02a śriye sudṛśīr uparasya yāḥ svar virocamānaḥ kakubhām acodate |
GV01rv_hn05u:777: RV_5,044.02c sugopā asi na dabhāya sukrato paro māyābhir ṛta āsa nāma te ||
GV01rv_hn05u:778: RV_5,044.03a atyaṃ haviḥ sacate sac ca dhātu cāriṣṭagātuḥ sa hotā
GV01rv_hn05u:780: RV_5,044.03c prasarsrāṇo anu barhir vṛṣā śiśur madhye yuvājaro visruhā hitaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:781: RV_5,044.04a pra va ete suyujo yāmann iṣṭaye nīcīr amuṣmai yamya ṛtāvṛdhaḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:782: RV_5,044.04c suyantubhiḥ sarvaśāsair abhīśubhiḥ krivir nāmāni pravaṇe
GV01rv_hn05u:784: RV_5,044.05a saṃjarbhurāṇas tarubhiḥ sutegṛbhaṃ vayākinaṃ cittagarbhāsu susvaruḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:785: RV_5,044.05c dhāravākeṣv ṛjugātha śobhase vardhasva patnīr abhi jīvo adhvare ||
GV01rv_hn05u:786: RV_5,044.06a yādṛg eva dadṛśe tādṛg ucyate saṃ chāyayā dadhire sidhrayāpsv
GV01rv_hn05u:787: RV_5,044.06c mahīm asmabhyam uruṣām uru jrayo bṛhat suvīram anapacyutaṃ sahaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:788: RV_5,044.07a vety agrur janivān vā ati spṛdhaḥ samaryatā manasā sūryaḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:790: RV_5,044.07c ghraṃsaṃ rakṣantam pari viśvato gayam asmākaṃ śarma vanavat svāvasuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:791: RV_5,044.08a jyāyāṃsam asya yatunasya ketuna ṛṣisvaraṃ carati yāsu nāma te
GV01rv_hn05u:792: RV_5,044.08c yādṛśmin dhāyi tam apasyayā vidad ya u svayaṃ vahate so araṃ karat ||
GV01rv_hn05u:793: RV_5,044.09a samudram āsām ava tasthe agrimā na riṣyati savanaṃ yasminn
GV01rv_hn05u:795: RV_5,044.09c atrā na hārdi kravaṇasya rejate yatrā matir vidyate pūtabandhanī ||
GV01rv_hn05u:796: RV_5,044.10a sa hi kṣatrasya manasasya cittibhir evāvadasya yajatasya sadhreḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:797: RV_5,044.10c avatsārasya spṛṇavāma raṇvabhiḥ śaviṣṭhaṃ vājaṃ viduṣā cid ardhyam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:798: RV_5,044.11a śyena āsām aditiḥ kakṣyo mado viśvavārasya yajatasya māyinaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:799: RV_5,044.11c sam anyam-anyam arthayanty etave vidur viṣāṇam paripānam anti
GV01rv_hn05u:801: RV_5,044.12a sadāpṛṇo yajato vi dviṣo vadhīd bāhuvṛktaḥ śrutavit taryo vaḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:803: RV_5,044.12c ubhā sa varā praty eti bhāti ca yad īṃ gaṇam bhajate suprayāvabhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:804: RV_5,044.13a sutambharo yajamānasya satpatir viśvāsām ūdhaḥ sa dhiyām udañcanaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:805: RV_5,044.13c bharad dhenū rasavac chiśriye payo 'nubruvāṇo adhy eti na
GV01rv_hn05u:807: RV_5,044.14a yo jāgāra tam ṛcaḥ kāmayante yo jāgāra tam u sāmāni yanti |
GV01rv_hn05u:808: RV_5,044.14c yo jāgāra tam ayaṃ soma āha tavāham asmi sakhye nyokāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:809: RV_5,044.15a agnir jāgāra tam ṛcaḥ kāmayante 'gnir jāgāra tam u sāmāni yanti |
GV01rv_hn05u:810: RV_5,044.15c agnir jāgāra tam ayaṃ soma āha tavāham asmi sakhye nyokāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:811: RV_5,045.01a vidā divo viṣyann adrim ukthair āyatyā uṣaso arcino guḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:812: RV_5,045.01c apāvṛta vrajinīr ut svar gād vi duro mānuṣīr deva āvaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:813: RV_5,045.02a vi sūryo amatiṃ na śriyaṃ sād orvād gavām mātā jānatī gāt |
GV01rv_hn05u:814: RV_5,045.02c dhanvarṇaso nadyaḥ khādoarṇā sthūṇeva sumitā dṛṃhata dyauḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:815: RV_5,045.03a asmā ukthāya parvatasya garbho mahīnāṃ januṣe pūrvyāya |
GV01rv_hn05u:816: RV_5,045.03c vi parvato jihīta sādhata dyaur āvivāsanto dasayanta bhūma ||
GV01rv_hn05u:817: RV_5,045.04a sūktebhir vo vacobhir devajuṣṭair indrā nv agnī avase huvadhyai |
GV01rv_hn05u:818: RV_5,045.04c ukthebhir hi ṣmā kavayaḥ suyajñā āvivāsanto maruto yajanti ||
GV01rv_hn05u:819: RV_5,045.05a eto nv adya sudhyo bhavāma pra ducchunā minavāmā varīyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:820: RV_5,045.05c āre dveṣāṃsi sanutar dadhāmāyāma prāñco yajamānam accha ||
GV01rv_hn05u:821: RV_5,045.06a etā dhiyaṃ kṛṇavāmā sakhāyo 'pa yā mātāṃ ṛṇuta vrajaṃ goḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:822: RV_5,045.06c yayā manur viśiśipraṃ jigāya yayā vaṇig vaṅkur āpā purīṣam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:823: RV_5,045.07a anūnod atra hastayato adrir ārcan yena daśa māso navagvāḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:824: RV_5,045.07c ṛtaṃ yatī saramā gā avindad viśvāni satyāṅgirāś cakāra ||
GV01rv_hn05u:825: RV_5,045.08a viśve asyā vyuṣi māhināyāḥ saṃ yad gobhir aṅgiraso navanta |
GV01rv_hn05u:826: RV_5,045.08c utsa āsām parame sadhastha ṛtasya pathā saramā vidad gāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:827: RV_5,045.09a ā sūryo yātu saptāśvaḥ kṣetraṃ yad asyorviyā dīrghayāthe |
GV01rv_hn05u:828: RV_5,045.09c raghuḥ śyenaḥ patayad andho acchā yuvā kavir dīdayad goṣu
GV01rv_hn05u:830: RV_5,045.10a ā sūryo aruhac chukram arṇo 'yukta yad dharito vītapṛṣṭhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:831: RV_5,045.10c udnā na nāvam anayanta dhīrā āśṛṇvatīr āpo arvāg atiṣṭhan ||
GV01rv_hn05u:832: RV_5,045.11a dhiyaṃ vo apsu dadhiṣe svarṣāṃ yayātaran daśa māso navagvāḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:833: RV_5,045.11c ayā dhiyā syāma devagopā ayā dhiyā tuturyāmāty aṃhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:834: RV_5,046.01a hayo na vidvāṃ ayuji svayaṃ dhuri tāṃ vahāmi prataraṇīm
GV01rv_hn05u:836: RV_5,046.01c nāsyā vaśmi vimucaṃ nāvṛtam punar vidvān pathaḥ puraeta ṛju
GV01rv_hn05u:838: RV_5,046.02a agna indra varuṇa mitra devāḥ śardhaḥ pra yanta mārutota
GV01rv_hn05u:840: RV_5,046.02c ubhā nāsatyā rudro adha gnāḥ pūṣā bhagaḥ sarasvatī juṣanta ||
GV01rv_hn05u:841: RV_5,046.03a indrāgnī mitrāvaruṇāditiṃ svaḥ pṛthivīṃ dyām marutaḥ parvatāṃ apaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:842: RV_5,046.03c huve viṣṇum pūṣaṇam brahmaṇas patim bhagaṃ nu śaṃsaṃ savitāram ūtaye ||
GV01rv_hn05u:843: RV_5,046.04a uta no viṣṇur uta vāto asridho draviṇodā uta somo mayas karat |
GV01rv_hn05u:844: RV_5,046.04c uta ṛbhava uta rāye no aśvinota tvaṣṭota vibhvānu maṃsate ||
GV01rv_hn05u:845: RV_5,046.05a uta tyan no mārutaṃ śardha ā gamad divikṣayaṃ yajatam barhir āsade |
GV01rv_hn05u:846: RV_5,046.05c bṛhaspatiḥ śarma pūṣota no yamad varūthyaṃ varuṇo mitro aryamā ||
GV01rv_hn05u:847: RV_5,046.06a uta tye naḥ parvatāsaḥ suśastayaḥ sudītayo nadyas trāmaṇe bhuvan |
GV01rv_hn05u:848: RV_5,046.06c bhago vibhaktā śavasāvasā gamad uruvyacā aditiḥ śrotu me havam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:849: RV_5,046.07a devānām patnīr uśatīr avantu naḥ prāvantu nas tujaye vājasātaye |
GV01rv_hn05u:850: RV_5,046.07c yāḥ pārthivāso yā apām api vrate tā no devīḥ suhavāḥ śarma yacchata ||
GV01rv_hn05u:851: RV_5,046.08a uta gnā vyantu devapatnīr indrāṇy agnāyy aśvinī rāṭ |
GV01rv_hn05u:852: RV_5,046.08c ā rodasī varuṇānī śṛṇotu vyantu devīr ya ṛtur janīnām ||
GV01rv_hn05u:853: RV_5,047.01a prayuñjatī diva eti bruvāṇā mahī mātā duhitur bodhayantī |
GV01rv_hn05u:854: RV_5,047.01c āvivāsantī yuvatir manīṣā pitṛbhya ā sadane johuvānā ||
GV01rv_hn05u:855: RV_5,047.02a ajirāsas tadapa īyamānā ātasthivāṃso amṛtasya nābhim |
GV01rv_hn05u:856: RV_5,047.02c anantāsa uravo viśvataḥ sīm pari dyāvāpṛthivī yanti panthāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:857: RV_5,047.03a ukṣā samudro aruṣaḥ suparṇaḥ pūrvasya yonim pitur ā viveśa |
GV01rv_hn05u:858: RV_5,047.03c madhye divo nihitaḥ pṛśnir aśmā vi cakrame rajasas pāty antau
GV01rv_hn05u:859: RV_5,047.04a catvāra īm bibhrati kṣemayanto daśa garbhaṃ carase dhāpayante |
GV01rv_hn05u:860: RV_5,047.04c tridhātavaḥ paramā asya gāvo divaś caranti pari sadyo antān
GV01rv_hn05u:861: RV_5,047.05a idaṃ vapur nivacanaṃ janāsaś caranti yan nadyas tasthur āpaḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:862: RV_5,047.05c dve yad īm bibhṛto mātur anye iheha jāte yamyā sabandhū ||
GV01rv_hn05u:863: RV_5,047.06a vi tanvate dhiyo asmā apāṃsi vastrā putrāya mātaro vayanti |
GV01rv_hn05u:864: RV_5,047.06c upaprakṣe vṛṣaṇo modamānā divas pathā vadhvo yanty accha ||
GV01rv_hn05u:865: RV_5,047.07a tad astu mitrāvaruṇā tad agne śaṃ yor asmabhyam idam astu śastam |
GV01rv_hn05u:866: RV_5,047.07c aśīmahi gādham uta pratiṣṭhāṃ namo dive bṛhate sādanāya ||
GV01rv_hn05u:867: RV_5,048.01a kad u priyāya dhāmne manāmahe svakṣatrāya svayaśase mahe vayam |
GV01rv_hn05u:868: RV_5,048.01c āmenyasya rajaso yad abhra āṃ apo vṛṇānā vitanoti māyinī ||
GV01rv_hn05u:869: RV_5,048.02a tā atnata vayunaṃ vīravakṣaṇaṃ samānyā vṛtayā viśvam ā rajaḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:870: RV_5,048.02c apo apācīr aparā apejate pra pūrvābhis tirate devayur janaḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:871: RV_5,048.03a ā grāvabhir ahanyebhir aktubhir variṣṭhaṃ vajram ā jigharti māyini |
GV01rv_hn05u:872: RV_5,048.03c śataṃ vā yasya pracaran sve dame saṃvartayanto vi ca
GV01rv_hn05u:874: RV_5,048.04a tām asya rītim paraśor iva praty anīkam akhyam bhuje asya varpasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:875: RV_5,048.04c sacā yadi pitumantam iva kṣayaṃ ratnaṃ dadhāti bharahūtaye viśe ||
GV01rv_hn05u:876: RV_5,048.05a sa jihvayā caturanīka ṛñjate cāru vasāno varuṇo yatann arim |
GV01rv_hn05u:877: RV_5,048.05c na tasya vidma puruṣatvatā vayaṃ yato bhagaḥ savitā dāti
GV01rv_hn05u:879: RV_5,049.01a devaṃ vo adya savitāram eṣe bhagaṃ ca ratnaṃ vibhajantam āyoḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:880: RV_5,049.01c ā vāṃ narā purubhujā vavṛtyāṃ dive-dive cid aśvinā sakhīyan
GV01rv_hn05u:881: RV_5,049.02a prati prayāṇam asurasya vidvān sūktair devaṃ savitāraṃ duvasya |
GV01rv_hn05u:882: RV_5,049.02c upa bruvīta namasā vijānañ jyeṣṭhaṃ ca ratnaṃ vibhajantam āyoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:883: RV_5,049.03a adatrayā dayate vāryāṇi pūṣā bhago aditir vasta usraḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:884: RV_5,049.03c indro viṣṇur varuṇo mitro agnir ahāni bhadrā janayanta dasmāḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:885: RV_5,049.04a tan no anarvā savitā varūthaṃ tat sindhava iṣayanto anu gman
GV01rv_hn05u:886: RV_5,049.04c upa yad voce adhvarasya hotā rāyaḥ syāma patayo vājaratnāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:887: RV_5,049.05a pra ye vasubhya īvad ā namo dur ye mitre varuṇe sūktavācaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:888: RV_5,049.05c avaitv abhvaṃ kṛṇutā varīyo divaspṛthivyor avasā madema ||
GV01rv_hn05u:889: RV_5,050.01a viśvo devasya netur marto vurīta sakhyam |
GV01rv_hn05u:890: RV_5,050.01c viśvo rāya iṣudhyati dyumnaṃ vṛṇīta puṣyase ||
GV01rv_hn05u:891: RV_5,050.02a te te deva netar ye cemāṃ anuśase |
GV01rv_hn05u:892: RV_5,050.02c te rāyā te hy āpṛce sacemahi sacathyaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:893: RV_5,050.03a ato na ā nṝn atithīn ataḥ patnīr daśasyata |
GV01rv_hn05u:894: RV_5,050.03c āre viśvam patheṣṭhāṃ dviṣo yuyotu yūyuviḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:895: RV_5,050.04a yatra vahnir abhihito dudravad droṇyaḥ paśuḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:897: RV_5,050.05a eṣa te deva netā rathaspatiḥ śaṃ rayiḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:898: RV_5,050.05c śaṃ rāye śaṃ svastaya iṣastuto manāmahe devastuto manāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn05u:899: RV_5,051.01a agne sutasya pītaye viśvair ūmebhir ā gahi |
GV01rv_hn05u:901: RV_5,051.02a ṛtadhītaya ā gata satyadharmāṇo adhvaram |
GV01rv_hn05u:903: RV_5,051.03a viprebhir vipra santya prātaryāvabhir ā gahi |
GV01rv_hn05u:905: RV_5,051.04a ayaṃ somaś camū suto 'matre pari ṣicyate |
GV01rv_hn05u:907: RV_5,051.05a vāyav ā yāhi vītaye juṣāṇo havyadātaye |
GV01rv_hn05u:909: RV_5,051.06a indraś ca vāyav eṣāṃ sutānām pītim arhathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:910: RV_5,051.06c tāñ juṣethām arepasāv abhi prayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:911: RV_5,051.07a sutā indrāya vāyave somāso dadhyāśiraḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:912: RV_5,051.07c nimnaṃ na yanti sindhavo 'bhi prayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:913: RV_5,051.08a sajūr viśvebhir devebhir aśvibhyām uṣasā sajūḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:914: RV_5,051.08c ā yāhy agne atrivat sute raṇa ||
GV01rv_hn05u:915: RV_5,051.09a sajūr mitrāvaruṇābhyāṃ sajūḥ somena viṣṇunā |
GV01rv_hn05u:916: RV_5,051.09c ā yāhy agne atrivat sute raṇa ||
GV01rv_hn05u:917: RV_5,051.10a sajūr ādityair vasubhiḥ sajūr indreṇa vāyunā |
GV01rv_hn05u:918: RV_5,051.10c ā yāhy agne atrivat sute raṇa ||
GV01rv_hn05u:919: RV_5,051.11a svasti no mimītām aśvinā bhagaḥ svasti devy aditir anarvaṇaḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:920: RV_5,051.11c svasti pūṣā asuro dadhātu naḥ svasti dyāvāpṛthivī sucetunā ||
GV01rv_hn05u:921: RV_5,051.12a svastaye vāyum upa bravāmahai somaṃ svasti bhuvanasya yas patiḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:922: RV_5,051.12c bṛhaspatiṃ sarvagaṇaṃ svastaye svastaya ādityāso bhavantu naḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:923: RV_5,051.13a viśve devā no adyā svastaye vaiśvānaro vasur agniḥ svastaye |
GV01rv_hn05u:924: RV_5,051.13c devā avantv ṛbhavaḥ svastaye svasti no rudraḥ pātv aṃhasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:925: RV_5,051.14a svasti mitrāvaruṇā svasti pathye revati |
GV01rv_hn05u:926: RV_5,051.14c svasti na indraś cāgniś ca svasti no adite kṛdhi ||
GV01rv_hn05u:927: RV_5,051.15a svasti panthām anu carema sūryācandramasāv iva |
GV01rv_hn05u:928: RV_5,051.15c punar dadatāghnatā jānatā saṃ gamemahi ||
GV01rv_hn05u:929: RV_5,052.01a pra śyāvāśva dhṛṣṇuyārcā marudbhir ṛkvabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:930: RV_5,052.01c ye adrogham anuṣvadhaṃ śravo madanti yajñiyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:931: RV_5,052.02a te hi sthirasya śavasaḥ sakhāyaḥ santi dhṛṣṇuyā |
GV01rv_hn05u:932: RV_5,052.02c te yāmann ā dhṛṣadvinas tmanā pānti śaśvataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:933: RV_5,052.03a te syandrāso nokṣaṇo 'ti ṣkandanti śarvarīḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:934: RV_5,052.03c marutām adhā maho divi kṣamā ca manmahe ||
GV01rv_hn05u:935: RV_5,052.04a marutsu vo dadhīmahi stomaṃ yajñaṃ ca dhṛṣṇuyā |
GV01rv_hn05u:936: RV_5,052.04c viśve ye mānuṣā yugā pānti martyaṃ riṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:937: RV_5,052.05a arhanto ye sudānavo naro asāmiśavasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:938: RV_5,052.05c pra yajñaṃ yajñiyebhyo divo arcā marudbhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:939: RV_5,052.06a ā rukmair ā yudhā nara ṛṣvā ṛṣṭīr asṛkṣata |
GV01rv_hn05u:940: RV_5,052.06c anv enāṃ aha vidyuto maruto jajjhatīr iva bhānur arta tmanā divaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:941: RV_5,052.07a ye vāvṛdhanta pārthivā ya urāv antarikṣa ā |
GV01rv_hn05u:942: RV_5,052.07c vṛjane vā nadīnāṃ sadhasthe vā maho divaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:943: RV_5,052.08a śardho mārutam uc chaṃsa satyaśavasam ṛbhvasam |
GV01rv_hn05u:944: RV_5,052.08c uta sma te śubhe naraḥ pra syandrā yujata tmanā ||
GV01rv_hn05u:945: RV_5,052.09a uta sma te paruṣṇyām ūrṇā vasata śundhyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:946: RV_5,052.09c uta pavyā rathānām adrim bhindanty ojasā ||
GV01rv_hn05u:948: RV_5,052.10c etebhir mahyaṃ nāmabhir yajñaṃ viṣṭāra ohate ||
GV01rv_hn05u:949: RV_5,052.11a adhā naro ny ohate 'dhā niyuta ohate |
GV01rv_hn05u:950: RV_5,052.11c adhā pārāvatā iti citrā rūpāṇi darśyā ||
GV01rv_hn05u:951: RV_5,052.12a chandastubhaḥ kubhanyava utsam ā kīriṇo nṛtuḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:952: RV_5,052.12c te me ke cin na tāyava ūmā āsan dṛśi tviṣe ||
GV01rv_hn05u:953: RV_5,052.13a ya ṛṣvā ṛṣṭividyutaḥ kavayaḥ santi vedhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:954: RV_5,052.13c tam ṛṣe mārutaṃ gaṇaṃ namasyā ramayā girā ||
GV01rv_hn05u:955: RV_5,052.14a accha ṛṣe mārutaṃ gaṇaṃ dānā mitraṃ na yoṣaṇā |
GV01rv_hn05u:956: RV_5,052.14c divo vā dhṛṣṇava ojasā stutā dhībhir iṣaṇyata ||
GV01rv_hn05u:957: RV_5,052.15a nū manvāna eṣāṃ devāṃ acchā na vakṣaṇā |
GV01rv_hn05u:958: RV_5,052.15c dānā saceta sūribhir yāmaśrutebhir añjibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:959: RV_5,052.16a pra ye me bandhveṣe gāṃ vocanta sūrayaḥ pṛśniṃ vocanta
GV01rv_hn05u:961: RV_5,052.16c adhā pitaram iṣmiṇaṃ rudraṃ vocanta śikvasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:962: RV_5,052.17a sapta me sapta śākina ekam-ekā śatā daduḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:963: RV_5,052.17c yamunāyām adhi śrutam ud rādho gavyam mṛje ni rādho aśvyam mṛje ||
GV01rv_hn05u:964: RV_5,053.01a ko veda jānam eṣāṃ ko vā purā sumneṣv āsa marutām |
GV01rv_hn05u:966: RV_5,053.02a aitān ratheṣu tasthuṣaḥ kaḥ śuśrāva kathā yayuḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:967: RV_5,053.02c kasmai sasruḥ sudāse anv āpaya iḷābhir vṛṣṭayaḥ saha ||
GV01rv_hn05u:968: RV_5,053.03a te ma āhur ya āyayur upa dyubhir vibhir made |
GV01rv_hn05u:969: RV_5,053.03c naro maryā arepasa imān paśyann iti ṣṭuhi ||
GV01rv_hn05u:970: RV_5,053.04a ye añjiṣu ye vāśīṣu svabhānavaḥ srakṣu rukmeṣu khādiṣu |
GV01rv_hn05u:972: RV_5,053.05a yuṣmākaṃ smā rathāṃ anu mude dadhe maruto jīradānavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:974: RV_5,053.06a ā yaṃ naraḥ sudānavo dadāśuṣe divaḥ kośam acucyavuḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:975: RV_5,053.06c vi parjanyaṃ sṛjanti rodasī anu dhanvanā yanti vṛṣṭayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:976: RV_5,053.07a tatṛdānāḥ sindhavaḥ kṣodasā rajaḥ pra sasrur dhenavo yathā |
GV01rv_hn05u:977: RV_5,053.07c syannā aśvā ivādhvano vimocane vi yad vartanta enyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:978: RV_5,053.08a ā yāta maruto diva āntarikṣād amād uta |
GV01rv_hn05u:980: RV_5,053.09a mā vo rasānitabhā kubhā krumur mā vaḥ sindhur ni rīramat |
GV01rv_hn05u:981: RV_5,053.09c mā vaḥ pari ṣṭhāt sarayuḥ purīṣiṇy asme it sumnam astu vaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:982: RV_5,053.10a taṃ vaḥ śardhaṃ rathānāṃ tveṣaṃ gaṇam mārutaṃ navyasīnām |
GV01rv_hn05u:984: RV_5,053.11a śardhaṃ-śardhaṃ va eṣāṃ vrātaṃ-vrātaṃ gaṇaṃ-gaṇaṃ suśastibhiḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:986: RV_5,053.12a kasmā adya sujātāya rātahavyāya pra yayuḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:988: RV_5,053.13a yena tokāya tanayāya dhānyam bījaṃ vahadhve akṣitam |
GV01rv_hn05u:989: RV_5,053.13c asmabhyaṃ tad dhattana yad va īmahe rādho viśvāyu saubhagam
GV01rv_hn05u:990: RV_5,053.14a atīyāma nidas tiraḥ svastibhir hitvāvadyam arātīḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:991: RV_5,053.14c vṛṣṭvī śaṃ yor āpa usri bheṣajaṃ syāma marutaḥ saha ||
GV01rv_hn05u:992: RV_5,053.15a sudevaḥ samahāsati suvīro naro marutaḥ sa martyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:994: RV_5,053.16a stuhi bhojān stuvato asya yāmani raṇan gāvo na yavase |
GV01rv_hn05u:995: RV_5,053.16c yataḥ pūrvāṃ iva sakhīṃr anu hvaya girā gṛṇīhi kāminaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:996: RV_5,054.01a pra śardhāya mārutāya svabhānava imāṃ vācam anajā parvatacyute |
GV01rv_hn05u:997: RV_5,054.01c gharmastubhe diva ā pṛṣṭhayajvane dyumnaśravase mahi nṛmṇam arcata ||
GV01rv_hn05u:998: RV_5,054.02a pra vo marutas taviṣā udanyavo vayovṛdho aśvayujaḥ parijrayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:999: RV_5,054.02c saṃ vidyutā dadhati vāśati tritaḥ svaranty āpo 'vanā
GV01rv_hn05u:1001: RV_5,054.03a vidyunmahaso naro aśmadidyavo vātatviṣo marutaḥ parvatacyutaḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:1002: RV_5,054.03c abdayā cin muhur ā hrādunīvṛta stanayadamā rabhasā udojasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1003: RV_5,054.04a vy aktūn rudrā vy ahāni śikvaso vy antarikṣaṃ vi rajāṃsi dhūtayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1004: RV_5,054.04c vi yad ajrāṃ ajatha nāva īṃ yathā vi durgāṇi maruto nāha riṣyatha ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1005: RV_5,054.05a tad vīryaṃ vo maruto mahitvanaṃ dīrghaṃ tatāna sūryo na
GV01rv_hn05u:1007: RV_5,054.05c etā na yāme agṛbhītaśociṣo 'naśvadāṃ yan ny ayātanā girim ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1008: RV_5,054.06a abhrāji śardho maruto yad arṇasam moṣathā vṛkṣaṃ kapaneva vedhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1009: RV_5,054.06c adha smā no aramatiṃ sajoṣasaś cakṣur iva yantam anu neṣathā sugam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1010: RV_5,054.07a na sa jīyate maruto na hanyate na sredhati na vyathate na riṣyati |
GV01rv_hn05u:1011: RV_5,054.07c nāsya rāya upa dasyanti notaya ṛṣiṃ vā yaṃ rājānaṃ vā suṣūdatha ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1012: RV_5,054.08a niyutvanto grāmajito yathā naro 'ryamaṇo na marutaḥ kabandhinaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1013: RV_5,054.08c pinvanty utsaṃ yad ināso asvaran vy undanti pṛthivīm madhvo
GV01rv_hn05u:1015: RV_5,054.09a pravatvatīyam pṛthivī marudbhyaḥ pravatvatī dyaur bhavati
GV01rv_hn05u:1017: RV_5,054.09c pravatvatīḥ pathyā antarikṣyāḥ pravatvantaḥ parvatā jīradānavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1018: RV_5,054.10a yan marutaḥ sabharasaḥ svarṇaraḥ sūrya udite madathā divo naraḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1019: RV_5,054.10c na vo 'śvāḥ śrathayantāha sisrataḥ sadyo asyādhvanaḥ pāram aśnutha ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1020: RV_5,054.11a aṃseṣu va ṛṣṭayaḥ patsu khādayo vakṣassu rukmā maruto rathe
GV01rv_hn05u:1022: RV_5,054.11c agnibhrājaso vidyuto gabhastyoḥ śiprāḥ śīrṣasu vitatā
GV01rv_hn05u:1024: RV_5,054.12a taṃ nākam aryo agṛbhītaśociṣaṃ ruśat pippalam maruto vi dhūnutha |
GV01rv_hn05u:1025: RV_5,054.12c sam acyanta vṛjanātitviṣanta yat svaranti ghoṣaṃ vitatam ṛtāyavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1026: RV_5,054.13a yuṣmādattasya maruto vicetaso rāyaḥ syāma rathyo vayasvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1027: RV_5,054.13c na yo yucchati tiṣyo yathā divo 'sme rāranta marutaḥ sahasriṇam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1028: RV_5,054.14a yūyaṃ rayim maruta spārhavīraṃ yūyam ṛṣim avatha sāmavipram |
GV01rv_hn05u:1029: RV_5,054.14c yūyam arvantam bharatāya vājaṃ yūyaṃ dhattha rājānaṃ śruṣṭimantam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1030: RV_5,054.15a tad vo yāmi draviṇaṃ sadyaūtayo yenā svar ṇa tatanāma nṝṃr abhi |
GV01rv_hn05u:1031: RV_5,054.15c idaṃ su me maruto haryatā vaco yasya tarema tarasā śataṃ himāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1032: RV_5,055.01a prayajyavo maruto bhrājadṛṣṭayo bṛhad vayo dadhire
GV01rv_hn05u:1034: RV_5,055.01c īyante aśvaiḥ suyamebhir āśubhiḥ śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1035: RV_5,055.02a svayaṃ dadhidhve taviṣīṃ yathā vida bṛhan mahānta urviyā vi
GV01rv_hn05u:1037: RV_5,055.02c utāntarikṣam mamire vy ojasā śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata
GV01rv_hn05u:1038: RV_5,055.03a sākaṃ jātāḥ subhvaḥ sākam ukṣitāḥ śriye cid ā prataraṃ
GV01rv_hn05u:1040: RV_5,055.03c virokiṇaḥ sūryasyeva raśmayaḥ śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1041: RV_5,055.04a ābhūṣeṇyaṃ vo maruto mahitvanaṃ didṛkṣeṇyaṃ sūryasyeva
GV01rv_hn05u:1043: RV_5,055.04c uto asmāṃ amṛtatve dadhātana śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata
GV01rv_hn05u:1044: RV_5,055.05a ud īrayathā marutaḥ samudrato yūyaṃ vṛṣṭiṃ varṣayathā purīṣiṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1045: RV_5,055.05c na vo dasrā upa dasyanti dhenavaḥ śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1046: RV_5,055.06a yad aśvān dhūrṣu pṛṣatīr ayugdhvaṃ hiraṇyayān praty atkāṃ amugdhvam |
GV01rv_hn05u:1047: RV_5,055.06c viśvā it spṛdho maruto vy asyatha śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata ||
