GV01rv_hn05u:1048: RV_5,055.07a na parvatā na nadyo varanta vo yatrācidhvam maruto gacchathed
GV01rv_hn05u:1050: RV_5,055.07c uta dyāvāpṛthivī yāthanā pari śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata
GV01rv_hn05u:1051: RV_5,055.08a yat pūrvyam maruto yac ca nūtanaṃ yad udyate vasavo yac ca śasyate |
GV01rv_hn05u:1052: RV_5,055.08c viśvasya tasya bhavathā navedasaḥ śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1053: RV_5,055.09a mṛḷata no maruto mā vadhiṣṭanāsmabhyaṃ śarma bahulaṃ vi yantana |
GV01rv_hn05u:1054: RV_5,055.09c adhi stotrasya sakhyasya gātana śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1055: RV_5,055.10a yūyam asmān nayata vasyo acchā nir aṃhatibhyo maruto gṛṇānāḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:1056: RV_5,055.10c juṣadhvaṃ no havyadātiṃ yajatrā vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1057: RV_5,056.01a agne śardhantam ā gaṇam piṣṭaṃ rukmebhir añjibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1058: RV_5,056.01c viśo adya marutām ava hvaye divaś cid rocanād adhi ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1059: RV_5,056.02a yathā cin manyase hṛdā tad in me jagmur āśasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1060: RV_5,056.02c ye te nediṣṭhaṃ havanāny āgaman tān vardha bhīmasaṃdṛśaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1061: RV_5,056.03a mīḷhuṣmatīva pṛthivī parāhatā madanty ety asmad ā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1062: RV_5,056.03c ṛkṣo na vo marutaḥ śimīvāṃ amo dudhro gaur iva bhīmayuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1063: RV_5,056.04a ni ye riṇanty ojasā vṛthā gāvo na durdhuraḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1064: RV_5,056.04c aśmānaṃ cit svaryam parvataṃ girim pra cyāvayanti yāmabhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1065: RV_5,056.05a ut tiṣṭha nūnam eṣāṃ stomaiḥ samukṣitānām |
GV01rv_hn05u:1066: RV_5,056.05c marutām purutamam apūrvyaṃ gavāṃ sargam iva hvaye ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1067: RV_5,056.06a yuṅgdhvaṃ hy aruṣī rathe yuṅgdhvaṃ ratheṣu rohitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1068: RV_5,056.06c yuṅgdhvaṃ harī ajirā dhuri voḷhave vahiṣṭhā dhuri voḷhave ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1069: RV_5,056.07a uta sya vājy aruṣas tuviṣvaṇir iha sma dhāyi darśataḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1070: RV_5,056.07c mā vo yāmeṣu marutaś ciraṃ karat pra taṃ ratheṣu codata ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1071: RV_5,056.08a rathaṃ nu mārutaṃ vayaṃ śravasyum ā huvāmahe |
GV01rv_hn05u:1072: RV_5,056.08c ā yasmin tasthau suraṇāni bibhratī sacā marutsu rodasī ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1073: RV_5,056.09a taṃ vaḥ śardhaṃ ratheśubhaṃ tveṣam panasyum ā huve |
GV01rv_hn05u:1074: RV_5,056.09c yasmin sujātā subhagā mahīyate sacā marutsu mīḷhuṣī ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1075: RV_5,057.01a ā rudrāsa indravantaḥ sajoṣaso hiraṇyarathāḥ suvitāya gantana
GV01rv_hn05u:1076: RV_5,057.01c iyaṃ vo asmat prati haryate matis tṛṣṇaje na diva utsā udanyave ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1077: RV_5,057.02a vāśīmanta ṛṣṭimanto manīṣiṇaḥ sudhanvāna iṣumanto niṣaṅgiṇaḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:1078: RV_5,057.02c svaśvā stha surathāḥ pṛśnimātaraḥ svāyudhā maruto yāthanā śubham ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1079: RV_5,057.03a dhūnutha dyām parvatān dāśuṣe vasu ni vo vanā jihate yāmano bhiyā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1080: RV_5,057.03c kopayatha pṛthivīm pṛśnimātaraḥ śubhe yad ugrāḥ pṛṣatīr ayugdhvam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1081: RV_5,057.04a vātatviṣo maruto varṣanirṇijo yamā iva susadṛśaḥ supeśasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1082: RV_5,057.04c piśaṅgāśvā aruṇāśvā arepasaḥ pratvakṣaso mahinā dyaur
GV01rv_hn05u:1084: RV_5,057.05a purudrapsā añjimantaḥ sudānavas tveṣasaṃdṛśo anavabhrarādhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1085: RV_5,057.05c sujātāso januṣā rukmavakṣaso divo arkā amṛtaṃ nāma bhejire ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1086: RV_5,057.06a ṛṣṭayo vo maruto aṃsayor adhi saha ojo bāhvor vo balaṃ hitam |
GV01rv_hn05u:1087: RV_5,057.06c nṛmṇā śīrṣasv āyudhā ratheṣu vo viśvā vaḥ śrīr adhi tanūṣu pipiśe ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1088: RV_5,057.07a gomad aśvāvad rathavat suvīraṃ candravad rādho maruto dadā naḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1089: RV_5,057.07c praśastiṃ naḥ kṛṇuta rudriyāso bhakṣīya vo 'vaso daivyasya ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1090: RV_5,057.08a haye naro maruto mṛḷatā nas tuvīmaghāso amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1091: RV_5,057.08c satyaśrutaḥ kavayo yuvāno bṛhadgirayo bṛhad ukṣamāṇāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1092: RV_5,058.01a tam u nūnaṃ taviṣīmantam eṣāṃ stuṣe gaṇam mārutaṃ navyasīnām
GV01rv_hn05u:1093: RV_5,058.01c ya āśvaśvā amavad vahanta uteśire amṛtasya svarājaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1094: RV_5,058.02a tveṣaṃ gaṇaṃ tavasaṃ khādihastaṃ dhunivratam māyinaṃ
GV01rv_hn05u:1096: RV_5,058.02c mayobhuvo ye amitā mahitvā vandasva vipra tuvirādhaso nṝn ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1097: RV_5,058.03a ā vo yantūdavāhāso adya vṛṣṭiṃ ye viśve maruto junanti |
GV01rv_hn05u:1098: RV_5,058.03c ayaṃ yo agnir marutaḥ samiddha etaṃ juṣadhvaṃ kavayo yuvānaḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:1099: RV_5,058.04a yūyaṃ rājānam iryaṃ janāya vibhvataṣṭaṃ janayathā yajatrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1100: RV_5,058.04c yuṣmad eti muṣṭihā bāhujūto yuṣmat sadaśvo marutaḥ suvīraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1101: RV_5,058.05a arā ived acaramā aheva pra-pra jāyante akavā mahobhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1102: RV_5,058.05c pṛśneḥ putrā upamāso rabhiṣṭhāḥ svayā matyā marutaḥ sam mimikṣuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1103: RV_5,058.06a yat prāyāsiṣṭa pṛṣatībhir aśvair vīḷupavibhir maruto
GV01rv_hn05u:1105: RV_5,058.06c kṣodanta āpo riṇate vanāny avosriyo vṛṣabhaḥ krandatu dyauḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1106: RV_5,058.07a prathiṣṭa yāman pṛthivī cid eṣām bharteva garbhaṃ svam ic
GV01rv_hn05u:1108: RV_5,058.07c vātān hy aśvān dhury āyuyujre varṣaṃ svedaṃ cakrire rudriyāsaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1109: RV_5,058.08a haye naro maruto mṛḷatā nas tuvīmaghāso amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1110: RV_5,058.08c satyaśrutaḥ kavayo yuvāno bṛhadgirayo bṛhad ukṣamāṇāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1111: RV_5,059.01a pra va spaḷ akran suvitāya dāvane 'rcā dive pra pṛthivyā ṛtam bhare |
GV01rv_hn05u:1112: RV_5,059.01c ukṣante aśvān taruṣanta ā rajo 'nu svam bhānuṃ śrathayante
GV01rv_hn05u:1114: RV_5,059.02a amād eṣām bhiyasā bhūmir ejati naur na pūrṇā kṣarati vyathir yatī |
GV01rv_hn05u:1115: RV_5,059.02c dūredṛśo ye citayanta emabhir antar mahe vidathe yetire naraḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:1116: RV_5,059.03a gavām iva śriyase śṛṅgam uttamaṃ sūryo na cakṣū rajaso
GV01rv_hn05u:1118: RV_5,059.03c atyā iva subhvaś cārava sthana maryā iva śriyase cetathā
GV01rv_hn05u:1120: RV_5,059.04a ko vo mahānti mahatām ud aśnavat kas kāvyā marutaḥ ko ha pauṃsyā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1121: RV_5,059.04c yūyaṃ ha bhūmiṃ kiraṇaṃ na rejatha pra yad bharadhve suvitāya dāvane ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1122: RV_5,059.05a aśvā ived aruṣāsaḥ sabandhavaḥ śūrā iva prayudhaḥ prota yuyudhuḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1123: RV_5,059.05c maryā iva suvṛdho vāvṛdhur naraḥ sūryasya cakṣuḥ pra minanti
GV01rv_hn05u:1125: RV_5,059.06a te ajyeṣṭhā akaniṣṭhāsa udbhido 'madhyamāso mahasā vi vāvṛdhuḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1126: RV_5,059.06c sujātāso januṣā pṛśnimātaro divo maryā ā no acchā jigātana ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1127: RV_5,059.07a vayo na ye śreṇīḥ paptur ojasāntān divo bṛhataḥ sānunas pari
GV01rv_hn05u:1128: RV_5,059.07c aśvāsa eṣām ubhaye yathā viduḥ pra parvatasya nabhanūṃr acucyavuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1129: RV_5,059.08a mimātu dyaur aditir vītaye naḥ saṃ dānucitrā uṣaso yatantām |
GV01rv_hn05u:1130: RV_5,059.08c ācucyavur divyaṃ kośam eta ṛṣe rudrasya maruto gṛṇānāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1131: RV_5,060.01a īḷe agniṃ svavasaṃ namobhir iha prasatto vi cayat kṛtaṃ naḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1132: RV_5,060.01c rathair iva pra bhare vājayadbhiḥ pradakṣiṇin marutāṃ stomam ṛdhyām ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1133: RV_5,060.02a ā ye tasthuḥ pṛṣatīṣu śrutāsu sukheṣu rudrā maruto ratheṣu |
GV01rv_hn05u:1134: RV_5,060.02c vanā cid ugrā jihate ni vo bhiyā pṛthivī cid rejate parvataś cit ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1135: RV_5,060.03a parvataś cin mahi vṛddho bibhāya divaś cit sānu rejata svane vaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1136: RV_5,060.03c yat krīḷatha maruta ṛṣṭimanta āpa iva sadhryañco dhavadhve ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1137: RV_5,060.04a varā ived raivatāso hiraṇyair abhi svadhābhis tanvaḥ pipiśre |
GV01rv_hn05u:1138: RV_5,060.04c śriye śreyāṃsas tavaso ratheṣu satrā mahāṃsi cakrire tanūṣu ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1139: RV_5,060.05a ajyeṣṭhāso akaniṣṭhāsa ete sam bhrātaro vāvṛdhuḥ saubhagāya |
GV01rv_hn05u:1140: RV_5,060.05c yuvā pitā svapā rudra eṣāṃ sudughā pṛśniḥ sudinā marudbhyaḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:1141: RV_5,060.06a yad uttame maruto madhyame vā yad vāvame subhagāso divi ṣṭha
GV01rv_hn05u:1142: RV_5,060.06c ato no rudrā uta vā nv asyāgne vittād dhaviṣo yad yajāma ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1143: RV_5,060.07a agniś ca yan maruto viśvavedaso divo vahadhva uttarād adhi
GV01rv_hn05u:1145: RV_5,060.07c te mandasānā dhunayo riśādaso vāmaṃ dhatta yajamānāya sunvate ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1146: RV_5,060.08a agne marudbhiḥ śubhayadbhir ṛkvabhiḥ somam piba mandasāno gaṇaśribhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1147: RV_5,060.08c pāvakebhir viśvaminvebhir āyubhir vaiśvānara pradivā ketunā
GV01rv_hn05u:1149: RV_5,061.01a ke ṣṭhā naraḥ śreṣṭhatamā ya eka-eka āyaya |
GV01rv_hn05u:1151: RV_5,061.02a kva vo 'śvāḥ kvābhīśavaḥ kathaṃ śeka kathā yaya |
GV01rv_hn05u:1153: RV_5,061.03a jaghane coda eṣāṃ vi sakthāni naro yamuḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1155: RV_5,061.04a parā vīrāsa etana maryāso bhadrajānayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1157: RV_5,061.05a sanat sāśvyam paśum uta gavyaṃ śatāvayam |
GV01rv_hn05u:1159: RV_5,061.06a uta tvā strī śaśīyasī puṃso bhavati vasyasī |
GV01rv_hn05u:1161: RV_5,061.07a vi yā jānāti jasuriṃ vi tṛṣyantaṃ vi kāminam |
GV01rv_hn05u:1163: RV_5,061.08a uta ghā nemo astutaḥ pumāṃ iti bruve paṇiḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1165: RV_5,061.09a uta me 'rapad yuvatir mamanduṣī prati śyāvāya vartanim |
GV01rv_hn05u:1166: RV_5,061.09c vi rohitā purumīḷhāya yematur viprāya dīrghayaśase ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1167: RV_5,061.10a yo me dhenūnāṃ śataṃ vaidadaśvir yathā dadat |
GV01rv_hn05u:1169: RV_5,061.11a ya īṃ vahanta āśubhiḥ pibanto madiram madhu |
GV01rv_hn05u:1171: RV_5,061.12a yeṣāṃ śriyādhi rodasī vibhrājante ratheṣv ā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1173: RV_5,061.13a yuvā sa māruto gaṇas tveṣaratho anedyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1175: RV_5,061.14a ko veda nūnam eṣāṃ yatrā madanti dhūtayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1177: RV_5,061.15a yūyam martaṃ vipanyavaḥ praṇetāra itthā dhiyā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1179: RV_5,061.16a te no vasūni kāmyā puruścandrā riśādasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1181: RV_5,061.17a etam me stomam ūrmye dārbhyāya parā vaha |
GV01rv_hn05u:1183: RV_5,061.18a uta me vocatād iti sutasome rathavītau |
GV01rv_hn05u:1184: RV_5,061.18c na kāmo apa veti me ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1185: RV_5,061.19a eṣa kṣeti rathavītir maghavā gomatīr anu |
GV01rv_hn05u:1187: RV_5,062.01a ṛtena ṛtam apihitaṃ dhruvaṃ vāṃ sūryasya yatra vimucanty aśvān |
GV01rv_hn05u:1188: RV_5,062.01c daśa śatā saha tasthus tad ekaṃ devānāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vapuṣām
GV01rv_hn05u:1190: RV_5,062.02a tat su vām mitrāvaruṇā mahitvam īrmā tasthuṣīr ahabhir duduhre |
GV01rv_hn05u:1191: RV_5,062.02c viśvāḥ pinvathaḥ svasarasya dhenā anu vām ekaḥ pavir ā
GV01rv_hn05u:1193: RV_5,062.03a adhārayatam pṛthivīm uta dyām mitrarājānā varuṇā mahobhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1194: RV_5,062.03c vardhayatam oṣadhīḥ pinvataṃ gā ava vṛṣṭiṃ sṛjataṃ jīradānū ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1195: RV_5,062.04a ā vām aśvāsaḥ suyujo vahantu yataraśmaya upa yantv arvāk |
GV01rv_hn05u:1196: RV_5,062.04c ghṛtasya nirṇig anu vartate vām upa sindhavaḥ pradivi kṣaranti ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1197: RV_5,062.05a anu śrutām amatiṃ vardhad urvīm barhir iva yajuṣā rakṣamāṇā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1198: RV_5,062.05c namasvantā dhṛtadakṣādhi garte mitrāsāthe varuṇeḷāsv antaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1199: RV_5,062.06a akravihastā sukṛte paraspā yaṃ trāsāthe varuṇeḷāsv antaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1200: RV_5,062.06c rājānā kṣatram ahṛṇīyamānā sahasrasthūṇam bibhṛthaḥ saha dvau
GV01rv_hn05u:1201: RV_5,062.07a hiraṇyanirṇig ayo asya sthūṇā vi bhrājate divy aśvājanīva |
GV01rv_hn05u:1202: RV_5,062.07c bhadre kṣetre nimitā tilvile vā sanema madhvo adhigartyasya ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1203: RV_5,062.08a hiraṇyarūpam uṣaso vyuṣṭāv ayasthūṇam uditā sūryasya |
GV01rv_hn05u:1204: RV_5,062.08c ā rohatho varuṇa mitra gartam ataś cakṣāthe aditiṃ ditiṃ ca
GV01rv_hn05u:1205: RV_5,062.09a yad baṃhiṣṭhaṃ nātividhe sudānū acchidraṃ śarma bhuvanasya gopā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1206: RV_5,062.09c tena no mitrāvaruṇāv aviṣṭaṃ siṣāsanto jigīvāṃsaḥ syāma ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1207: RV_5,063.01a ṛtasya gopāv adhi tiṣṭhatho rathaṃ satyadharmāṇā parame vyomani |
GV01rv_hn05u:1208: RV_5,063.01c yam atra mitrāvaruṇāvatho yuvaṃ tasmai vṛṣṭir madhumat pinvate divaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1209: RV_5,063.02a samrājāv asya bhuvanasya rājatho mitrāvaruṇā vidathe svardṛśā
GV01rv_hn05u:1210: RV_5,063.02c vṛṣṭiṃ vāṃ rādho amṛtatvam īmahe dyāvāpṛthivī vi caranti tanyavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1211: RV_5,063.03a samrājā ugrā vṛṣabhā divas patī pṛthivyā mitrāvaruṇā vicarṣaṇī |
GV01rv_hn05u:1212: RV_5,063.03c citrebhir abhrair upa tiṣṭhatho ravaṃ dyāṃ varṣayatho asurasya māyayā ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1213: RV_5,063.04a māyā vām mitrāvaruṇā divi śritā sūryo jyotiś carati citram
GV01rv_hn05u:1215: RV_5,063.04c tam abhreṇa vṛṣṭyā gūhatho divi parjanya drapsā madhumanta īrate ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1216: RV_5,063.05a rathaṃ yuñjate marutaḥ śubhe sukhaṃ śūro na mitrāvaruṇā gaviṣṭiṣu |
GV01rv_hn05u:1217: RV_5,063.05c rajāṃsi citrā vi caranti tanyavo divaḥ samrājā payasā na
GV01rv_hn05u:1219: RV_5,063.06a vācaṃ su mitrāvaruṇāv irāvatīm parjanyaś citrāṃ vadati tviṣīmatīm |
GV01rv_hn05u:1220: RV_5,063.06c abhrā vasata marutaḥ su māyayā dyāṃ varṣayatam aruṇām arepasam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1221: RV_5,063.07a dharmaṇā mitrāvaruṇā vipaścitā vratā rakṣethe asurasya māyayā
GV01rv_hn05u:1222: RV_5,063.07c ṛtena viśvam bhuvanaṃ vi rājathaḥ sūryam ā dhattho divi
GV01rv_hn05u:1224: RV_5,064.01a varuṇaṃ vo riśādasam ṛcā mitraṃ havāmahe |
GV01rv_hn05u:1225: RV_5,064.01c pari vrajeva bāhvor jaganvāṃsā svarṇaram ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1226: RV_5,064.02a tā bāhavā sucetunā pra yantam asmā arcate |
GV01rv_hn05u:1227: RV_5,064.02c śevaṃ hi jāryaṃ vāṃ viśvāsu kṣāsu joguve ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1228: RV_5,064.03a yan nūnam aśyāṃ gatim mitrasya yāyām pathā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1229: RV_5,064.03c asya priyasya śarmaṇy ahiṃsānasya saścire ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1231: RV_5,064.04c yad dha kṣaye maghonāṃ stotṝṇāṃ ca spūrdhase ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1232: RV_5,064.05a ā no mitra sudītibhir varuṇaś ca sadhastha ā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1233: RV_5,064.05c sve kṣaye maghonāṃ sakhīnāṃ ca vṛdhase ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1234: RV_5,064.06a yuvaṃ no yeṣu varuṇa kṣatram bṛhac ca bibhṛthaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1235: RV_5,064.06c uru ṇo vājasātaye kṛtaṃ rāye svastaye ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1236: RV_5,064.07a ucchantyām me yajatā devakṣatre ruśadgavi |
GV01rv_hn05u:1237: RV_5,064.07c sutaṃ somaṃ na hastibhir ā paḍbhir dhāvataṃ narā bibhratāv
GV01rv_hn05u:1239: RV_5,065.01a yaś ciketa sa sukratur devatrā sa bravītu naḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1240: RV_5,065.01c varuṇo yasya darśato mitro vā vanate giraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1241: RV_5,065.02a tā hi śreṣṭhavarcasā rājānā dīrghaśruttamā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1242: RV_5,065.02c tā satpatī ṛtāvṛdha ṛtāvānā jane-jane ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1243: RV_5,065.03a tā vām iyāno 'vase pūrvā upa bruve sacā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1244: RV_5,065.03c svaśvāsaḥ su cetunā vājāṃ abhi pra dāvane ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1245: RV_5,065.04a mitro aṃhoś cid ād uru kṣayāya gātuṃ vanate |
GV01rv_hn05u:1246: RV_5,065.04c mitrasya hi pratūrvataḥ sumatir asti vidhataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1249: RV_5,065.06a yuvam mitremaṃ janaṃ yatathaḥ saṃ ca nayathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1250: RV_5,065.06c mā maghonaḥ pari khyatam mo asmākam ṛṣīṇāṃ gopīthe na
GV01rv_hn05u:1252: RV_5,066.01a ā cikitāna sukratū devau marta riśādasā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1253: RV_5,066.01c varuṇāya ṛtapeśase dadhīta prayase mahe ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1254: RV_5,066.02a tā hi kṣatram avihrutaṃ samyag asuryam āśāte |
GV01rv_hn05u:1255: RV_5,066.02c adha vrateva mānuṣaṃ svar ṇa dhāyi darśatam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1256: RV_5,066.03a tā vām eṣe rathānām urvīṃ gavyūtim eṣām |
GV01rv_hn05u:1257: RV_5,066.03c rātahavyasya suṣṭutiṃ dadhṛk stomair manāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1258: RV_5,066.04a adhā hi kāvyā yuvaṃ dakṣasya pūrbhir adbhutā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1259: RV_5,066.04c ni ketunā janānāṃ cikethe pūtadakṣasā ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1260: RV_5,066.05a tad ṛtam pṛthivi bṛhac chravaeṣa ṛṣīṇām |
GV01rv_hn05u:1261: RV_5,066.05c jrayasānāv aram pṛthv ati kṣaranti yāmabhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1262: RV_5,066.06a ā yad vām īyacakṣasā mitra vayaṃ ca sūrayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1264: RV_5,067.01a baḷ itthā deva niṣkṛtam ādityā yajatam bṛhat |
GV01rv_hn05u:1265: RV_5,067.01c varuṇa mitrāryaman varṣiṣṭhaṃ kṣatram āśāthe ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1266: RV_5,067.02a ā yad yoniṃ hiraṇyayaṃ varuṇa mitra sadathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1267: RV_5,067.02c dhartārā carṣaṇīnāṃ yantaṃ sumnaṃ riśādasā ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1268: RV_5,067.03a viśve hi viśvavedaso varuṇo mitro aryamā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1269: RV_5,067.03c vratā padeva saścire pānti martyaṃ riṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1270: RV_5,067.04a te hi satyā ṛtaspṛśa ṛtāvāno jane-jane |
GV01rv_hn05u:1272: RV_5,067.05a ko nu vām mitrāstuto varuṇo vā tanūnām |
GV01rv_hn05u:1273: RV_5,067.05c tat su vām eṣate matir atribhya eṣate matiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1274: RV_5,068.01a pra vo mitrāya gāyata varuṇāya vipā girā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1276: RV_5,068.02a samrājā yā ghṛtayonī mitraś cobhā varuṇaś ca |
GV01rv_hn05u:1278: RV_5,068.03a tā naḥ śaktam pārthivasya maho rāyo divyasya |
GV01rv_hn05u:1280: RV_5,068.04a ṛtam ṛtena sapanteṣiraṃ dakṣam āśāte |
GV01rv_hn05u:1284: RV_5,069.01a trī rocanā varuṇa trīṃr uta dyūn trīṇi mitra dhārayatho
GV01rv_hn05u:1286: RV_5,069.01c vāvṛdhānāv amatiṃ kṣatriyasyānu vrataṃ rakṣamāṇāv ajuryam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1287: RV_5,069.02a irāvatīr varuṇa dhenavo vām madhumad vāṃ sindhavo mitra duhre
GV01rv_hn05u:1288: RV_5,069.02c trayas tasthur vṛṣabhāsas tisṛṇāṃ dhiṣaṇānāṃ retodhā vi dyumantaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1289: RV_5,069.03a prātar devīm aditiṃ johavīmi madhyandina uditā sūryasya |
GV01rv_hn05u:1290: RV_5,069.03c rāye mitrāvaruṇā sarvatāteḷe tokāya tanayāya śaṃ yoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1291: RV_5,069.04a yā dhartārā rajaso rocanasyotādityā divyā pārthivasya |
GV01rv_hn05u:1292: RV_5,069.04c na vāṃ devā amṛtā ā minanti vratāni mitrāvaruṇā dhruvāṇi ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1293: RV_5,070.01a purūruṇā cid dhy asty avo nūnaṃ vāṃ varuṇa |
GV01rv_hn05u:1295: RV_5,070.02a tā vāṃ samyag adruhvāṇeṣam aśyāma dhāyase |
GV01rv_hn05u:1297: RV_5,070.03a pātaṃ no rudrā pāyubhir uta trāyethāṃ sutrātrā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1299: RV_5,070.04a mā kasyādbhutakratū yakṣam bhujemā tanūbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1301: RV_5,071.01a ā no gantaṃ riśādasā varuṇa mitra barhaṇā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1303: RV_5,071.02a viśvasya hi pracetasā varuṇa mitra rājathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1305: RV_5,071.03a upa naḥ sutam ā gataṃ varuṇa mitra dāśuṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1307: RV_5,072.01a ā mitre varuṇe vayaṃ gīrbhir juhumo atrivat |
GV01rv_hn05u:1309: RV_5,072.02a vratena stho dhruvakṣemā dharmaṇā yātayajjanā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1311: RV_5,072.03a mitraś ca no varuṇaś ca juṣetāṃ yajñam iṣṭaye |
GV01rv_hn05u:1313: RV_5,073.01a yad adya sthaḥ parāvati yad arvāvaty aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1314: RV_5,073.01c yad vā purū purubhujā yad antarikṣa ā gatam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1315: RV_5,073.02a iha tyā purubhūtamā purū daṃsāṃsi bibhratā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1316: RV_5,073.02c varasyā yāmy adhrigū huve tuviṣṭamā bhuje ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1317: RV_5,073.03a īrmānyad vapuṣe vapuś cakraṃ rathasya yemathuḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1318: RV_5,073.03c pary anyā nāhuṣā yugā mahnā rajāṃsi dīyathaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1319: RV_5,073.04a tad ū ṣu vām enā kṛtaṃ viśvā yad vām anu ṣṭave |
GV01rv_hn05u:1320: RV_5,073.04c nānā jātāv arepasā sam asme bandhum eyathuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1321: RV_5,073.05a ā yad vāṃ sūryā rathaṃ tiṣṭhad raghuṣyadaṃ sadā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1322: RV_5,073.05c pari vām aruṣā vayo ghṛṇā varanta ātapaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1323: RV_5,073.06a yuvor atriś ciketati narā sumnena cetasā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1324: RV_5,073.06c gharmaṃ yad vām arepasaṃ nāsatyāsnā bhuraṇyati ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1325: RV_5,073.07a ugro vāṃ kakuho yayiḥ śṛṇve yāmeṣu saṃtaniḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1326: RV_5,073.07c yad vāṃ daṃsobhir aśvinātrir narāvavartati ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1327: RV_5,073.08a madhva ū ṣu madhūyuvā rudrā siṣakti pipyuṣī |
GV01rv_hn05u:1328: RV_5,073.08c yat samudrāti parṣathaḥ pakvāḥ pṛkṣo bharanta vām ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1329: RV_5,073.09a satyam id vā u aśvinā yuvām āhur mayobhuvā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1330: RV_5,073.09c tā yāman yāmahūtamā yāmann ā mṛḷayattamā ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1331: RV_5,073.10a imā brahmāṇi vardhanāśvibhyāṃ santu śantamā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1332: RV_5,073.10c yā takṣāma rathāṃ ivāvocāma bṛhan namaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1333: RV_5,074.01a kūṣṭho devāv aśvinādyā divo manāvasū |
GV01rv_hn05u:1334: RV_5,074.01c tac chravatho vṛṣaṇvasū atrir vām ā vivāsati ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1335: RV_5,074.02a kuha tyā kuha nu śrutā divi devā nāsatyā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1336: RV_5,074.02c kasminn ā yatatho jane ko vāṃ nadīnāṃ sacā ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1337: RV_5,074.03a kaṃ yāthaḥ kaṃ ha gacchathaḥ kam acchā yuñjāthe ratham |
GV01rv_hn05u:1338: RV_5,074.03c kasya brahmāṇi raṇyatho vayaṃ vām uśmasīṣṭaye ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1339: RV_5,074.04a pauraṃ cid dhy udaprutam paura paurāya jinvathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1340: RV_5,074.04c yad īṃ gṛbhītatātaye siṃham iva druhas pade ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1341: RV_5,074.05a pra cyavānāj jujuruṣo vavrim atkaṃ na muñcathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1342: RV_5,074.05c yuvā yadī kṛthaḥ punar ā kāmam ṛṇve vadhvaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1343: RV_5,074.06a asti hi vām iha stotā smasi vāṃ saṃdṛśi śriye |
GV01rv_hn05u:1344: RV_5,074.06c nū śrutam ma ā gatam avobhir vājinīvasū ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1345: RV_5,074.07a ko vām adya purūṇām ā vavne martyānām |
GV01rv_hn05u:1346: RV_5,074.07c ko vipro vipravāhasā ko yajñair vājinīvasū ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1347: RV_5,074.08a ā vāṃ ratho rathānāṃ yeṣṭho yātv aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1348: RV_5,074.08c purū cid asmayus tira āṅgūṣo martyeṣv ā ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1349: RV_5,074.09a śam ū ṣu vām madhūyuvāsmākam astu carkṛtiḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1350: RV_5,074.09c arvācīnā vicetasā vibhiḥ śyeneva dīyatam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1351: RV_5,074.10a aśvinā yad dha karhi cic chuśrūyātam imaṃ havam |
GV01rv_hn05u:1352: RV_5,074.10c vasvīr ū ṣu vām bhujaḥ pṛñcanti su vām pṛcaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1353: RV_5,075.01a prati priyatamaṃ rathaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vasuvāhanam |
GV01rv_hn05u:1354: RV_5,075.01c stotā vām aśvināv ṛṣi stomena prati bhūṣati mādhvī mama
GV01rv_hn05u:1356: RV_5,075.02a atyāyātam aśvinā tiro viśvā ahaṃ sanā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1357: RV_5,075.02c dasrā hiraṇyavartanī suṣumnā sindhuvāhasā mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1358: RV_5,075.03a ā no ratnāni bibhratāv aśvinā gacchataṃ yuvam |
GV01rv_hn05u:1359: RV_5,075.03c rudrā hiraṇyavartanī juṣāṇā vājinīvasū mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1360: RV_5,075.04a suṣṭubho vāṃ vṛṣaṇvasū rathe vāṇīcy āhitā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1361: RV_5,075.04c uta vāṃ kakuho mṛgaḥ pṛkṣaḥ kṛṇoti vāpuṣo mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1363: RV_5,075.05c vibhiś cyavānam aśvinā ni yātho advayāvinam mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1364: RV_5,075.06a ā vāṃ narā manoyujo 'śvāsaḥ pruṣitapsavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1365: RV_5,075.06c vayo vahantu pītaye saha sumnebhir aśvinā mādhvī mama śrutaṃ
GV01rv_hn05u:1367: RV_5,075.07a aśvināv eha gacchataṃ nāsatyā mā vi venatam |
GV01rv_hn05u:1368: RV_5,075.07c tiraś cid aryayā pari vartir yātam adābhyā mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1369: RV_5,075.08a asmin yajñe adābhyā jaritāraṃ śubhas patī |
GV01rv_hn05u:1370: RV_5,075.08c avasyum aśvinā yuvaṃ gṛṇantam upa bhūṣatho mādhvī mama śrutaṃ
GV01rv_hn05u:1372: RV_5,075.09a abhūd uṣā ruśatpaśur āgnir adhāyy ṛtviyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1373: RV_5,075.09c ayoji vāṃ vṛṣaṇvasū ratho dasrāv amartyo mādhvī mama śrutaṃ
GV01rv_hn05u:1375: RV_5,076.01a ā bhāty agnir uṣasām anīkam ud viprāṇāṃ devayā vāco asthuḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1376: RV_5,076.01c arvāñcā nūnaṃ rathyeha yātam pīpivāṃsam aśvinā gharmam accha ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1377: RV_5,076.02a na saṃskṛtam pra mimīto gamiṣṭhānti nūnam aśvinopastuteha |
GV01rv_hn05u:1378: RV_5,076.02c divābhipitve 'vasāgamiṣṭhā praty avartiṃ dāśuṣe śambhaviṣṭhā
GV01rv_hn05u:1379: RV_5,076.03a utā yātaṃ saṃgave prātar ahno madhyandina uditā sūryasya |
GV01rv_hn05u:1380: RV_5,076.03c divā naktam avasā śantamena nedānīm pītir aśvinā tatāna ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1381: RV_5,076.04a idaṃ hi vām pradivi sthānam oka ime gṛhā aśvinedaṃ duroṇam |
GV01rv_hn05u:1382: RV_5,076.04c ā no divo bṛhataḥ parvatād ādbhyo yātam iṣam ūrjaṃ vahantā ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1383: RV_5,076.05a sam aśvinor avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā supraṇītī gamema |
GV01rv_hn05u:1384: RV_5,076.05c ā no rayiṃ vahatam ota vīrān ā viśvāny amṛtā saubhagāni ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1385: RV_5,077.01a prātaryāvāṇā prathamā yajadhvam purā gṛdhrād araruṣaḥ pibātaḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:1386: RV_5,077.01c prātar hi yajñam aśvinā dadhāte pra śaṃsanti kavayaḥ pūrvabhājaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1387: RV_5,077.02a prātar yajadhvam aśvinā hinota na sāyam asti devayā ajuṣṭam |
GV01rv_hn05u:1388: RV_5,077.02c utānyo asmad yajate vi cāvaḥ pūrvaḥ-pūrvo yajamāno vanīyān ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1389: RV_5,077.03a hiraṇyatvaṅ madhuvarṇo ghṛtasnuḥ pṛkṣo vahann ā ratho vartate vām |
GV01rv_hn05u:1390: RV_5,077.03c manojavā aśvinā vātaraṃhā yenātiyātho duritāni viśvā ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1391: RV_5,077.04a yo bhūyiṣṭhaṃ nāsatyābhyāṃ viveṣa caniṣṭham pitvo rarate vibhāge |
GV01rv_hn05u:1392: RV_5,077.04c sa tokam asya pīparac chamībhir anūrdhvabhāsaḥ sadam it tuturyāt ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1393: RV_5,077.05a sam aśvinor avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā supraṇītī gamema |
GV01rv_hn05u:1394: RV_5,077.05c ā no rayiṃ vahatam ota vīrān ā viśvāny amṛtā saubhagāni ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1395: RV_5,078.01a aśvināv eha gacchataṃ nāsatyā mā vi venatam |
GV01rv_hn05u:1396: RV_5,078.01c haṃsāv iva patatam ā sutāṃ upa ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1397: RV_5,078.02a aśvinā hariṇāv iva gaurāv ivānu yavasam |
GV01rv_hn05u:1398: RV_5,078.02c haṃsāv iva patatam ā sutāṃ upa ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1399: RV_5,078.03a aśvinā vājinīvasū juṣethāṃ yajñam iṣṭaye |
GV01rv_hn05u:1400: RV_5,078.03c haṃsāv iva patatam ā sutāṃ upa ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1401: RV_5,078.04a atrir yad vām avarohann ṛbīsam ajohavīn nādhamāneva yoṣā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1402: RV_5,078.04c śyenasya cij javasā nūtanenāgacchatam aśvinā śantamena ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1403: RV_5,078.05a vi jihīṣva vanaspate yoniḥ sūṣyantyā iva |
GV01rv_hn05u:1404: RV_5,078.05c śrutam me aśvinā havaṃ saptavadhriṃ ca muñcatam ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1406: RV_5,078.06c māyābhir aśvinā yuvaṃ vṛkṣaṃ saṃ ca vi cācathaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1407: RV_5,078.07a yathā vātaḥ puṣkariṇīṃ samiṅgayati sarvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1408: RV_5,078.07c evā te garbha ejatu niraitu daśamāsyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1409: RV_5,078.08a yathā vāto yathā vanaṃ yathā samudra ejati |
GV01rv_hn05u:1410: RV_5,078.08c evā tvaṃ daśamāsya sahāvehi jarāyuṇā ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1411: RV_5,078.09a daśa māsāñ chaśayānaḥ kumāro adhi mātari |
GV01rv_hn05u:1412: RV_5,078.09c niraitu jīvo akṣato jīvo jīvantyā adhi ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1413: RV_5,079.01a mahe no adya bodhayoṣo rāye divitmatī |
GV01rv_hn05u:1414: RV_5,079.01c yathā cin no abodhayaḥ satyaśravasi vāyye sujāte aśvasūnṛte ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1415: RV_5,079.02a yā sunīthe śaucadrathe vy auccho duhitar divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1416: RV_5,079.02c sā vy uccha sahīyasi satyaśravasi vāyye sujāte aśvasūnṛte ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1417: RV_5,079.03a sā no adyābharadvasur vy ucchā duhitar divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1418: RV_5,079.03c yo vy aucchaḥ sahīyasi satyaśravasi vāyye sujāte aśvasūnṛte ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1419: RV_5,079.04a abhi ye tvā vibhāvari stomair gṛṇanti vahnayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1420: RV_5,079.04c maghair maghoni suśriyo dāmanvantaḥ surātayaḥ sujāte
GV01rv_hn05u:1422: RV_5,079.05a yac cid dhi te gaṇā ime chadayanti maghattaye |
GV01rv_hn05u:1423: RV_5,079.05c pari cid vaṣṭayo dadhur dadato rādho ahrayaṃ sujāte aśvasūnṛte ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1424: RV_5,079.06a aiṣu dhā vīravad yaśa uṣo maghoni sūriṣu |
GV01rv_hn05u:1425: RV_5,079.06c ye no rādhāṃsy ahrayā maghavāno arāsata sujāte aśvasūnṛte ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1426: RV_5,079.07a tebhyo dyumnam bṛhad yaśa uṣo maghony ā vaha |
GV01rv_hn05u:1427: RV_5,079.07c ye no rādhāṃsy aśvyā gavyā bhajanta sūrayaḥ sujāte aśvasūnṛte
GV01rv_hn05u:1428: RV_5,079.08a uta no gomatīr iṣa ā vahā duhitar divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1429: RV_5,079.08c sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ śukraiḥ śocadbhir arcibhiḥ sujāte aśvasūnṛte ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1430: RV_5,079.09a vy ucchā duhitar divo mā ciraṃ tanuthā apaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1431: RV_5,079.09c net tvā stenaṃ yathā ripuṃ tapāti sūro arciṣā sujāte
GV01rv_hn05u:1433: RV_5,079.10a etāvad ved uṣas tvam bhūyo vā dātum arhasi |
GV01rv_hn05u:1434: RV_5,079.10c yā stotṛbhyo vibhāvary ucchantī na pramīyase sujāte aśvasūnṛte ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1435: RV_5,080.01a dyutadyāmānam bṛhatīm ṛtena ṛtāvarīm aruṇapsuṃ vibhātīm |
GV01rv_hn05u:1436: RV_5,080.01c devīm uṣasaṃ svar āvahantīm prati viprāso matibhir jarante ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1437: RV_5,080.02a eṣā janaṃ darśatā bodhayantī sugān pathaḥ kṛṇvatī yāty agre |
GV01rv_hn05u:1438: RV_5,080.02c bṛhadrathā bṛhatī viśvaminvoṣā jyotir yacchaty agre ahnām ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1439: RV_5,080.03a eṣā gobhir aruṇebhir yujānāsredhantī rayim aprāyu cakre |
GV01rv_hn05u:1440: RV_5,080.03c patho radantī suvitāya devī puruṣṭutā viśvavārā vi bhāti ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1441: RV_5,080.04a eṣā vyenī bhavati dvibarhā āviṣkṛṇvānā tanvam purastāt |
GV01rv_hn05u:1442: RV_5,080.04c ṛtasya panthām anv eti sādhu prajānatīva na diśo mināti ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1443: RV_5,080.05a eṣā śubhrā na tanvo vidānordhveva snātī dṛśaye no asthāt |
GV01rv_hn05u:1444: RV_5,080.05c apa dveṣo bādhamānā tamāṃsy uṣā divo duhitā jyotiṣāgāt ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1445: RV_5,080.06a eṣā pratīcī duhitā divo nṝn yoṣeva bhadrā ni riṇīte apsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1446: RV_5,080.06c vyūrṇvatī dāśuṣe vāryāṇi punar jyotir yuvatiḥ pūrvathākaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1447: RV_5,081.01a yuñjate mana uta yuñjate dhiyo viprā viprasya bṛhato vipaścitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1448: RV_5,081.01c vi hotrā dadhe vayunāvid eka in mahī devasya savituḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:1450: RV_5,081.02a viśvā rūpāṇi prati muñcate kaviḥ prāsāvīd bhadraṃ dvipade catuṣpade |
GV01rv_hn05u:1451: RV_5,081.02c vi nākam akhyat savitā vareṇyo 'nu prayāṇam uṣaso vi rājati
GV01rv_hn05u:1452: RV_5,081.03a yasya prayāṇam anv anya id yayur devā devasya mahimānam ojasā
GV01rv_hn05u:1453: RV_5,081.03c yaḥ pārthivāni vimame sa etaśo rajāṃsi devaḥ savitā mahitvanā
GV01rv_hn05u:1454: RV_5,081.04a uta yāsi savitas trīṇi rocanota sūryasya raśmibhiḥ sam ucyasi
GV01rv_hn05u:1455: RV_5,081.04c uta rātrīm ubhayataḥ parīyasa uta mitro bhavasi deva dharmabhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1456: RV_5,081.05a uteśiṣe prasavasya tvam eka id uta pūṣā bhavasi deva yāmabhiḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:1457: RV_5,081.05c utedaṃ viśvam bhuvanaṃ vi rājasi śyāvāśvas te savita stomam
GV01rv_hn05u:1459: RV_5,082.01a tat savitur vṛṇīmahe vayaṃ devasya bhojanam |
GV01rv_hn05u:1460: RV_5,082.01c śreṣṭhaṃ sarvadhātamaṃ turam bhagasya dhīmahi ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1461: RV_5,082.02a asya hi svayaśastaraṃ savituḥ kac cana priyam |
GV01rv_hn05u:1463: RV_5,082.03a sa hi ratnāni dāśuṣe suvāti savitā bhagaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1465: RV_5,082.04a adyā no deva savitaḥ prajāvat sāvīḥ saubhagam |
GV01rv_hn05u:1467: RV_5,082.05a viśvāni deva savitar duritāni parā suva |
GV01rv_hn05u:1468: RV_5,082.05c yad bhadraṃ tan na ā suva ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1469: RV_5,082.06a anāgaso aditaye devasya savituḥ save |
GV01rv_hn05u:1471: RV_5,082.07a ā viśvadevaṃ satpatiṃ sūktair adyā vṛṇīmahe |
GV01rv_hn05u:1473: RV_5,082.08a ya ime ubhe ahanī pura ety aprayucchan |
GV01rv_hn05u:1475: RV_5,082.09a ya imā viśvā jātāny āśrāvayati ślokena |
GV01rv_hn05u:1477: RV_5,083.01a acchā vada tavasaṃ gīrbhir ābhi stuhi parjanyaṃ namasā vivāsa
GV01rv_hn05u:1478: RV_5,083.01c kanikradad vṛṣabho jīradānū reto dadhāty oṣadhīṣu garbham ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1479: RV_5,083.02a vi vṛkṣān hanty uta hanti rakṣaso viśvam bibhāya bhuvanam
GV01rv_hn05u:1481: RV_5,083.02c utānāgā īṣate vṛṣṇyāvato yat parjanya stanayan hanti duṣkṛtaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1482: RV_5,083.03a rathīva kaśayāśvāṃ abhikṣipann āvir dūtān kṛṇute varṣyāṃ aha |
GV01rv_hn05u:1483: RV_5,083.03c dūrāt siṃhasya stanathā ud īrate yat parjanyaḥ kṛṇute varṣyaṃ
GV01rv_hn05u:1485: RV_5,083.04a pra vātā vānti patayanti vidyuta ud oṣadhīr jihate pinvate
GV01rv_hn05u:1487: RV_5,083.04c irā viśvasmai bhuvanāya jāyate yat parjanyaḥ pṛthivīṃ retasāvati ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1488: RV_5,083.05a yasya vrate pṛthivī nannamīti yasya vrate śaphavaj jarbhurīti |
GV01rv_hn05u:1489: RV_5,083.05c yasya vrata oṣadhīr viśvarūpāḥ sa naḥ parjanya mahi śarma
GV01rv_hn05u:1491: RV_5,083.06a divo no vṛṣṭim maruto rarīdhvam pra pinvata vṛṣṇo aśvasya
GV01rv_hn05u:1493: RV_5,083.06c arvāṅ etena stanayitnunehy apo niṣiñcann asuraḥ pitā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1494: RV_5,083.07a abhi kranda stanaya garbham ā dhā udanvatā pari dīyā rathena
GV01rv_hn05u:1495: RV_5,083.07c dṛtiṃ su karṣa viṣitaṃ nyañcaṃ samā bhavantūdvato nipādāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1496: RV_5,083.08a mahāntaṃ kośam ud acā ni ṣiñca syandantāṃ kulyā viṣitāḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:1498: RV_5,083.08c ghṛtena dyāvāpṛthivī vy undhi suprapāṇam bhavatv aghnyābhyaḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:1499: RV_5,083.09a yat parjanya kanikradat stanayan haṃsi duṣkṛtaḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1500: RV_5,083.09c pratīdaṃ viśvam modate yat kiṃ ca pṛthivyām adhi ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1501: RV_5,083.10a avarṣīr varṣam ud u ṣū gṛbhāyākar dhanvāny atyetavā u |
GV01rv_hn05u:1502: RV_5,083.10c ajījana oṣadhīr bhojanāya kam uta prajābhyo 'vido manīṣām ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1503: RV_5,084.01a baḷ itthā parvatānāṃ khidram bibharṣi pṛthivi |
GV01rv_hn05u:1504: RV_5,084.01c pra yā bhūmim pravatvati mahnā jinoṣi mahini ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1505: RV_5,084.02a stomāsas tvā vicāriṇi prati ṣṭobhanty aktubhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1506: RV_5,084.02c pra yā vājaṃ na heṣantam perum asyasy arjuni ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1507: RV_5,084.03a dṛḷhā cid yā vanaspatīn kṣmayā dardharṣy ojasā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1508: RV_5,084.03c yat te abhrasya vidyuto divo varṣanti vṛṣṭayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1509: RV_5,085.01a pra samrāje bṛhad arcā gabhīram brahma priyaṃ varuṇāya śrutāya |
GV01rv_hn05u:1510: RV_5,085.01c vi yo jaghāna śamiteva carmopastire pṛthivīṃ sūryāya ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1511: RV_5,085.02a vaneṣu vy antarikṣaṃ tatāna vājam arvatsu paya usriyāsu |
GV01rv_hn05u:1512: RV_5,085.02c hṛtsu kratuṃ varuṇo apsv agniṃ divi sūryam adadhāt somam
GV01rv_hn05u:1514: RV_5,085.03a nīcīnabāraṃ varuṇaḥ kavandham pra sasarja rodasī antarikṣam |
GV01rv_hn05u:1515: RV_5,085.03c tena viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā yavaṃ na vṛṣṭir vy unatti bhūma
GV01rv_hn05u:1516: RV_5,085.04a unatti bhūmim pṛthivīm uta dyāṃ yadā dugdhaṃ varuṇo vaṣṭy ād it |
GV01rv_hn05u:1517: RV_5,085.04c sam abhreṇa vasata parvatāsas taviṣīyantaḥ śrathayanta vīrāḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:1518: RV_5,085.05a imām ū ṣv āsurasya śrutasya mahīm māyāṃ varuṇasya pra vocam |
GV01rv_hn05u:1519: RV_5,085.05c māneneva tasthivāṃ antarikṣe vi yo mame pṛthivīṃ sūryeṇa ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1520: RV_5,085.06a imām ū nu kavitamasya māyām mahīṃ devasya nakir ā dadharṣa |
GV01rv_hn05u:1521: RV_5,085.06c ekaṃ yad udnā na pṛṇanty enīr āsiñcantīr avanayaḥ samudram ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1522: RV_5,085.07a aryamyaṃ varuṇa mitryaṃ vā sakhāyaṃ vā sadam id bhrātaraṃ vā
GV01rv_hn05u:1523: RV_5,085.07c veśaṃ vā nityaṃ varuṇāraṇaṃ vā yat sīm āgaś cakṛmā śiśrathas tat ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1524: RV_5,085.08a kitavāso yad riripur na dīvi yad vā ghā satyam uta yan na
GV01rv_hn05u:1526: RV_5,085.08c sarvā tā vi ṣya śithireva devādhā te syāma varuṇa priyāsaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1527: RV_5,086.01a indrāgnī yam avatha ubhā vājeṣu martyam |
GV01rv_hn05u:1528: RV_5,086.01c dṛḷhā cit sa pra bhedati dyumnā vāṇīr iva tritaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1529: RV_5,086.02a yā pṛtanāsu duṣṭarā yā vājeṣu śravāyyā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1530: RV_5,086.02c yā pañca carṣaṇīr abhīndrāgnī tā havāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1531: RV_5,086.03a tayor id amavac chavas tigmā didyun maghonoḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1532: RV_5,086.03c prati druṇā gabhastyor gavāṃ vṛtraghna eṣate ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1533: RV_5,086.04a tā vām eṣe rathānām indrāgnī havāmahe |
GV01rv_hn05u:1534: RV_5,086.04c patī turasya rādhaso vidvāṃsā girvaṇastamā ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1535: RV_5,086.05a tā vṛdhantāv anu dyūn martāya devāv adabhā |
GV01rv_hn05u:1536: RV_5,086.05c arhantā cit puro dadhe 'ṃśeva devāv arvate ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1537: RV_5,086.06a evendrāgnibhyām ahāvi havyaṃ śūṣyaṃ ghṛtaṃ na pūtam adribhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn05u:1538: RV_5,086.06c tā sūriṣu śravo bṛhad rayiṃ gṛṇatsu didhṛtam iṣaṃ gṛṇatsu
GV01rv_hn05u:1540: RV_5,087.01a pra vo mahe matayo yantu viṣṇave marutvate girijā evayāmarut
GV01rv_hn05u:1541: RV_5,087.01c pra śardhāya prayajyave sukhādaye tavase bhandadiṣṭaye
GV01rv_hn05u:1543: RV_5,087.02a pra ye jātā mahinā ye ca nu svayam pra vidmanā bruvata evayāmarut |
GV01rv_hn05u:1544: RV_5,087.02c kratvā tad vo maruto nādhṛṣe śavo dānā mahnā tad eṣām adhṛṣṭāso nādrayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1545: RV_5,087.03a pra ye divo bṛhataḥ śṛṇvire girā suśukvānaḥ subhva evayāmarut
GV01rv_hn05u:1546: RV_5,087.03c na yeṣām irī sadhastha īṣṭa āṃ agnayo na svavidyutaḥ pra syandrāso dhunīnām ||
GV01rv_hn05u:1547: RV_5,087.04a sa cakrame mahato nir urukramaḥ samānasmāt sadasa evayāmarut |
GV01rv_hn05u:1548: RV_5,087.04c yadāyukta tmanā svād adhi ṣṇubhir viṣpardhaso vimahaso jigāti śevṛdho nṛbhiḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:1549: RV_5,087.05a svano na vo 'mavān rejayad vṛṣā tveṣo yayis taviṣa evayāmarut
GV01rv_hn05u:1550: RV_5,087.05c yenā sahanta ṛñjata svarociṣa sthāraśmāno hiraṇyayāḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:1552: RV_5,087.06a apāro vo mahimā vṛddhaśavasas tveṣaṃ śavo 'vatv evayāmarut |
GV01rv_hn05u:1553: RV_5,087.06c sthātāro hi prasitau saṃdṛśi sthana te na uruṣyatā nidaḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:1555: RV_5,087.07a te rudrāsaḥ sumakhā agnayo yathā tuvidyumnā avantv evayāmarut |
GV01rv_hn05u:1556: RV_5,087.07c dīrgham pṛthu paprathe sadma pārthivaṃ yeṣām ajmeṣv ā mahaḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:1558: RV_5,087.08a adveṣo no maruto gātum etana śrotā havaṃ jaritur evayāmarut |
GV01rv_hn05u:1559: RV_5,087.08c viṣṇor mahaḥ samanyavo yuyotana smad rathyo na daṃsanāpa dveṣāṃsi sanutaḥ
GV01rv_hn05u:1560: RV_5,087.09a gantā no yajñaṃ yajñiyāḥ suśami śrotā havam arakṣa evayāmarut
GV01rv_hn05u:1561: RV_5,087.09c jyeṣṭhāso na parvatāso vyomani yūyaṃ tasya pracetasaḥ syāta durdhartavo nidaḥ
